tgt: Selemo sa 2015 se boela hape se tshwaya la sehopotso sa bo59 sa Mohwanto wa Basadi o neng o leba Union Buildings kgahlanong le melao ya dipasa, empa seo sa qala ho itukisetsa sehopotso sa bo60 sa 2016.

src: U-Maphefo Matsemela, neSekela leHloko yeYunivesithi, uPhrofesa u-Dan Kgwadi.
tgt: O tla felehetswa ke Setho sa Lekgotla la Phethahatso (MEC) wa Thuto wa Leboya Bophirimela, Mofumahadi Maphefo Matsemela, le Motlatsi wa Motjhanselara wa NWU, Moporofesara Dan Kgwadi.

src: Ummongondaba weVeke yezeSayensi yomnyaka wee-2015 uthi “UmNyaka weenTjhababatjhaba wokuKhanya nokuKhanyisa okuSekelwe kuThekhnoloji.” Kuzakukhangiswa ngokukhanyisa okuhlukileko nokuqakatheka kwakho ekuthuthukiseni amaphilo njengokusetjenziswa komtjhini okhupha umkhanyo otjhisa amalwele kezokwelapha, ukuhlinzwa kwamehlo, zokukhiqiza emabubulweni, ukutjhiselela iinkoloyi neensimbi zokukhandela ukufahla kweelelesi.
tgt: Mokotaba wa NSW wa 2015 ke “Selemo sa Matjhaba sa Kganya le Dithekenoloji tse itshetlehileng ka Kganya.” Kganya le bohlokwa ba yona ho ntlafatseng maphelo ho tla bontshwa ka mekgwa e fapaneng e kang ho sebediswa ha leisara ho tsa bophelo bo botle, sejareng ya mahlo, tlhahiso diindastering, ho tjheseletsa makoloi mmoho le mabone a tshireletso bakeng sa ho tshosa mashodu.

src: UmNyango wezeSayensi neThekhnoloji, ngokusebenzisana nomKhandlu wezokuRhubhulula ngeSayensi namaBubulo (i-CSIR), usise ku-photonics – ekuyisayensi yethekhnoloji yokuphehlwa, ukulawulwa nokuyabula imisebe namacezwana womkhanyo.
tgt: Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloji, ka Lekgotla la Saense le Diphuputso tsa Diindasteri (CSIR), le tsetetse ho saense ya maqhubu a kganya – saense ya thekenoloji ya kganya ya ho fehla, ho laola le ho fofonela maqhubu a kganya le boseberwana ba kganya.

src: Lokhu kudosele epumelelweni yokuthoma ephasini ngethekhnoloji i-digital laser.
tgt: Ho tse ding, sena se lebisitse tshibollong ya pele ya lefatshe ya thekenoloji ya leisara ya dijithale.

src: Ipumelelo eyenziwe yi-CSIR ijamele indlela etja yokucabanga ngokwethekhnoloji yomkhanyo otjhisako begodu ingaba sisekelo sekusasa lendlela ithekhnoloji eyakhiwa ngayo.
tgt: Tshibollo ena ya CSIR e emetse mokgwa o motjha wa ho nahana ka thekenoloji ya leisara mme e ka ba lepatlelo leo dithekenoloji tsa kamoso di ka ahwang ho lona.

src: Hlangana nokhunye abasizwa ngakho lababantu abasizwako, basizwa nangembewu kunye nangezinjana zeentjalo (iintjadlwana) kobanyana bazozitjalela zona eemvandeni zabo zekhaya, basizwe nangeemali zokuzivulela iinhlangano zomphakathi kunye namakoporasi.
tgt: Thuso ya tjhelete ya R1 083 160 ho tswa ho Lekala la Naha la Ntshetsopele le tshehetsa dihlopha tse 11 tse sa keneleng ditsheng tsa Thuto ya Ntshetsopele ya Bana (ECD), moo bana ba 975 jwale ba kenang ditsheng tsa ECD tulong eo mme ba 789 ba bona ba kgola molemo ho tswa tshehetsong ya mmuso ya ditjhelete ya ECKabinete e thoholetsa dikatleho tse ntseng di tswela pele tsa Operation Fiela, e leng ya moraorao tjena Kapa Leboya moo tshebetso e kopanetsweng ke Tshebeletso ya Sepolesa ya Aforika Borwa (SAPS), mafapha a mmuso, le makala a tiisetso ya molao a porofense le a bomasepala a ileng a tswela pele ho netefatsa hore batho ba bolokehile le ho ikutlwa ba le jwalo.

src: UmTlamo oPheleleko weenDakamizwa eliZweni lOke wee-2013-2017, ulungelela imizamo karhulumende yokulwa nomukghwa wokuphila ngotjwala newokuphila ngeendakamizwa.
tgt: Moralo wa Naha wa Mankgonthe mabapi le Dithethefatsi, 2013-2017, o hokahanya mekutu ya mmuso ntweng e kgahlanong le tshebediso e mpe ya jwala le dithethefatsi.

src: IKhabinethi ibawa boke abantu ukuthi basebenzisane ngokulekelelana norhulumende neemphathimandla zomthetho kobanyana kuzokucithwa imikghwa yeendakamizwa, eyona ibangela imiraro eminengi emphakathini, ekubalwa hlangana nayo nenturhu phezu kwabantu abasikazi nabantwana kunye nokukhahlunyezwa kwabantwana.
tgt: Kabinete e ipiletsa ho badudi ho sebetsa le mmuso le makala a tiisetso ya molao ho fedisa tshebediso e mpe ya dithethefatsi ka hara setjhaba sa rona, e leng sesosa sa mathata a mangata a kahisano, ho kenyeletsa dikgoka kgahlanong le basadi le tlhekefetso ya bana.

src: Bekube khathesi, i-ASIDI seyiqede iinkolo ezili-116 yafakela amanzi eenkolweni ezima-449, yathoma amahlelo wokuhlwengisa eenkolweni ezima-425, yafakela igezi eenkolweni ezima-298.
tgt: Ho fihlela mona, ASIDI e se e phethetse dikolo tse 116 le ho fana ka metsi ho dikolo tse 499, tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere ho tse 425 le motlakase ho tse 298.

src: ISekela likaMengameli uRamaphosa uzokuya eKhongresini yamaZwe ngamaZwe yamaBulungelo weeNcwadi nezokwAzisa eyokubanjelwa e—Cape Town International Convention Centre ukusukela mhlana ali-15 ukuyokufika mhlana ama-21 kuRhoboyi wee-2015, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “AmaBulungelo WeeNcwadi AmaJadu: Ukufikeleleka, Ituthuko NeTjhuguluko.”Ikhongresi le ithomana nomsebenzi karhulumende wokuvula amabulungelo weencwadi angaphezulu kwe-1000 kilo loke ilizweli ukusuke mhlana ali-18 kuVelabahlinze wee-2015 ukuyokufika mhlana ali-18 kuVelabahlinze wee-2016, anqophe ukukhuthaza abafundi ukukhuthalela ukufunda.
tgt: Motlatsi wa Moporesidente Ramaphosa o tla kenela Seboka sa Federeishene ya Matjhaba ya Mekgatlo ya Lefatshe ya Dilaeborari le Tlhahisoleseding e tla tshwarwa Setsing sa Matjhaba sa Dikopano sa Motse Kapa ho tloha ka la 15 ho isa ka la 21 Phato 2015 tlasa mookotaba: “Dilaeborari tse Hlwahlwa: Phihlello, Ntshetsopele le Diphethoho”.

src: UNgqongqotjhe wezokuVakatjha u-Derek Hanekom uzokuvula iNyanga yezeVakatjho mhlana ali-16 kuRhoboyi wee-2015 e-Euphoria Golf Estate, e-Mookgophong, eLimpopo, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Asigidi Amathuba Amatjha Alindileko”, lommongondaba-ke ususelwa kummongondaba weLanga LezeVakatjho LePhasi LOke (27 kuKhukhulamungu ), othi: “Ibhiliyoni Yeemvakatjhibukeli – Ibhiliyoni Yamathuba.”Imimmongondaba yamazwe ngamazawe neyalapha ekhethu le inqophe ukuphandlulula iimvakatjhibukeli ngokuqakatheka kwevakatjhobukelo elinokuziphendulela.
tgt: Letona la Bohahlaudi Derek Hanekom le tla thakgola Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi ka la 16 Phato 2015 Euphoria Golf Estate, Mookgophong ho la Limpopo tlasa mookotaba: “Menyetla e metjha e Milione e re Emetse”, o nkuweng ho tswa ho mookotaba wa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) o reng: “Bahahlaudi ba Bilione – Menyetla e Bilione”.

src: UmNyango wezemiDlalo nezokuziThabisa nomNyango wezaboMma sewenze isivumelwano sokusebenzisana ne-G-sport ukuthokozisa nokuhlonipha abantu abasikazi beSewula Afrika abasemidlalweni.
tgt: Mafapha a dipapadi le boithapollo le a basadi a ikopantse le G-Sport mabapi le ho tlotla basadi ba Aforika Borwa ba nkang karolo dipapading.

src: UmNyango wezemiDlalo nezokuziThabisa kunye ne-G-Sport bazokuhlonipha abadlali abasikazi abalungele nabafanele kuhlonitjhwa, nabaphathi bemidlalo abasiphalaze ngitjho nanyana babegandelelwe kangangani, kodwa baphumelela ukuphakamisa iflarha lelizwe lekhethu.
tgt: Lefapha la dipapadi le Boithapollo le G-Sport a tla fana ka dikgau ho basadi ba lokelang ho tsa mabelo le batsamaisi ba ikitlaeditseng kgahlanong le ditsela tsohle tsa kgatello bakeng sa ho phahamisa folakga ya naha ena.

src: UmNyango wezemiDlalo usawulimuka nomsebenzi osafunekako wokuraga nokuphumelelisa ihlelo lokulinganiswa kwabo boke abantu abasikazi abasemidlalweni, kezokuphatha nekudlaleni.
tgt: Lefapha le dula le fadimehetse mosebetsi o hlokahalang bakeng sa ho ntshetsapele lenaneo la tekatekano ya basadi bohle ba itahletseng ka setotswana dipapading, ka bobedi ho tsa tsamaiso le ho nka karolo.

src: LababoNongorwana beliZwe abathandathu, yi-Order of Mendi for Bravery, i- Order of Ikhamanga, i-Order of the Baobab, i-Order of Luthuli, i-Order of Mapungubwe, kunye ne-Order of the Companions of OR Tambo.
tgt: Dikgau tsa Tlotlo tsa Naha tse tsheletseng ke Tlotlo ya Mendi bakeng sa ho bontsha Sebete, Tlotlo ya Ikhamanga, Tlotlo ya Baobao, Tlotlo ya Luthuli, Tlotlo ya Mapungubwe, le Tlotlo ya Metswalle ya OR Tambo.

src: UNom Mathanzima Hubert Mweli – UmNqophisi Zombelele emNyangweni wezeFundo esiSekelo.
tgt: Monghadi Mathanzima Hubert Mweli – Motsamaisi-Kakaretso (DG) ho Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo.

src: UNom Petrus Mduduzi Shabane – kwelulwe isikhathi sekontraga yomsebenzi kamNqophisi Zombelele womNyango wezokuThuthukisa iiNdawo zemaKhaya nokuBuyekezwa kweNarha.
tgt: Monghadi Petrus Mduduzi Shabane – katoloso ya konteraka ya tshebetso ya DG ho Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Dibaka tsa Mahae le Tlhabollo ya Mobu.

src: UDorh Nontsikelelo Tshayingca-Mashiya – ISekela likamNqophisi Zombelele wezokuTjhejwa kokuSebenza nokuHlungwa ngokusemThethweni, emNyangweni wezokuHlela, zokuTjheja nokuHlunga.
tgt: Ngaka Nontsikelelo Tshayingca-Mashiya – Motlatsi wa DG wa Lekala la Tshebetso, Bodisa le Tlhatlhobo ho Lefapha la Meralo,Bodisa le Tlhatlhobo.

src: UNom Nkhumeleni Victor Tharage – UmNqophisi Zombelele emNyangweni wezokuVakatjha.
tgt: Monghadi Nkhumeleni Victor Tharage – DG ho Lefapha la Bohahlaudi.

src: Isitetjhi lesi singaphila iminyaka ema-50.I-Unit 6 yalungelelaniswa kokuthoma kusiphehligezi senarha mhla amabili kuNtaka enyakeni lo begodu beyisokhu ifakela igezi kusiphehligezi selizwe nofana kunini lokha nagade silungiselwa ukuhlolelwa ukusebenza ngokuzeleko.
tgt: Nako ya tshebetso ya seteishene sena sa motlakase e reretswe ho ba dilemo tse 50.Yuniti 6 e qadile ho hokelwa ho marangrang a naha ka la 2 Tlhakubele selemong sena mme e ne e ntse e fana ka motlakase ho marangrang a naha ka diqonwanaqonwana ha e ne e ntse e le tlasa diteko nako le nako tsa hore e ka sebetsa ka botlalo.

src: NgoMvulo weveke ezako, (mhla ama-31 kuRhoboyi), i-Unit 2 ye-Koeberg Power Station ngeTjhingalanga Kapa izokuvalelwa ukutjhejwa okuhleliweko.
tgt: Ka Mantaha o tlang (31 Phato), Yuniti 2 ya Seteishene sa Matla a Motlakase sa Koeberg ho la Kapa Bophirima e tla kwalwa bakeng sa ditokiso tse rerilweng.

src: Qobe eenyangeni ezili-16 ukuya kezili-18, iyunithi eyodwa kamabili la e-Koeberg iyavalwa kobana ifakelwe amafutha, ukuhlolwa nokutjhejwa.
tgt: Dikgweding tse ding le tse ding tse 16 ho isa ho tse 18, yuniti ka nngwe ya tse pedi tsa Koeberg e a kwalwa bakeng sa ho tshela mafura, tlhatlhobo le ditokiso.

src: Ukuvalwa lokhu okuhlala kwenziwa kuhlelwa ngendlela yokukhandela kobana amayunithi la angajanyiswa ngasikhathi sinye ukubalekela iinyanga zobusika qobe nyaka.
tgt: Ho kwalwa ho setlwaeding ho reretswe bakeng sa hore ho seke ha etsahala hore diyuniti ka bobedi di seke tsa sebetsa ka nako e le nngwe le ho phema dikgwedi tsa mariha selemong ka seng.

src: Nofana sineragelophambili ekuthuthukiseni ukuphehlwa kwegezi, iKhabinethi ikhombela amaSewula Afrika ukuraga nokonga igezi.
tgt: Leha re tswela pele ho etsa kgatelo pele bakeng sa ho ntlafatsa bokgoni ba rona ba ho fehla motlakase, Kabinete e ipiletsa ho maAforika Borwa ho tswela pele ho sebedisa motlakase ka paballo.

src: Kungokokuthoma kobana i-Afrika inikelwe ithuba lokwamukela imiDlalo ye-Commonwealth begodu lokhu kuzakubeka iSewula Afrika ebujameni obuhle bokuqalwa njengelizwe lezamavakatjho wezemidlalo kunvulele nesiQhema seSewula Afrika amathuba.
tgt: Ho tshwara dipapadi tsena hape ho tla sebedisa lefa la meralo ya motheo la Mohope wa Lefatshe wa FIFA wa 2010.Dipapadi tsa 2022 tsa Commonwealth di lebeletswe ho fana ka ho fihla ho R20 bilione ya lekeno ho moruo, e leng se tla fetohang tlatsetso ya R11 bilione kgolong ya GDP.. Kabinete e tjhaelletse monwana phatlalatso ya Tlaleho ya Nako (2009-2014) ya bo-5th ya Aforika Borwa mabapi le ho Kenngwa Tshebetsong ha Khonvenshene e mabapi le ho Fediswa ha Mekgwa yohle ya Kgethollo kgahlanong le Basadi Koranteng ya Mmuso, bakeng sa ho tshwaela ha setjhaba.

src: UMengameli uZuma uzakukhambela umnyanya wama-70 wokuPheliswa kokuSahlelwa kweChina nePi yesiBili yePhasi ngeChina mhla ama-2 ukuya nakama-4 kuKhukhulamungu enyakeni lo wee-2015, begodu uzakubamba imikhulumiswano noMengameli u-Xi Jinping.
tgt: Moporesidente Zuma o tla kenela Sehopotso sa bo-70 sa Qetello ya Kgapo ya China le Ntwa ya Bobedi ya Lefatshe ka hara Riphaboliki ya Setjhaba ya China (PRC) ho tloha ka la 2 ho isa ka la 4 Loetse 2015, mme o tla ba le ditherisano tsa ka bobedi le Moporesidente Xi Jinping.

src: NgeNyanga yamaGugu, umNyango wezamaSiko nobuKghwari uzakubamba umnyanya wokuphendula isoyi eCabazini leenKutani zeLizwe Loke ngePitori ukuqinisekisa ukuthoma kokwakhiwa kwesikhumbuzo esizakutjengisa isikhathi sangaphambilini kokubuswa mbuso webandlululo, umzabalazo wekululeko neenkutani ezihlukileko ezalwela ituthuko yezehlalakuhle.
tgt: Kabinete e ipiletsa ho maAforika Borwa kaofela ho keteka nalane ya rona le botjhaba bo fapafapaneng ha naha e tshwaya Kgwedi ya Lefa ka Loetse tlasa mookotaba: “Tsebo ya rona ya tsa lapeng, lefa la rona: Re lebisa boitsebisong, kgothaletso le paballong ya lefa le phelang la Aforika Borwa”.Sehopotso sa selemong sena se tla latela mokgwa wa meketjana ya boithabiso mme badudi ba kgothaletswa ho sebedisa lefa la bona le phelang le kang dijo, bonono ba boiqapelo, motjeko le mmino ho kgothaletsa phapang ya botjhaba, ditokelo tsa botho, kaho ya setjhaba le ntshetsopele ya moruo.

src: ILanga lokuGidinga imiSebenzi yesiPholisa seSewula Afrika (i-SAPS) laqobe nyaka mhla asiThandathu kuKhukhulamungu enyakeni wee-2015 e-Union Buildings ePitori lizakugidinga isibindi nokuzinikela kwamapholisa ahlongakalela emsebenzini lokha nakavikela umphakathi.
tgt: Aforika Borwa hape e tla keteka Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi ka Loetse, e leng nako e lokileng bakeng sa malapa ho etela dibaka tsa lefa hore re ikgokahanye le bophelo ba rona ba mehleng.

src: Ngehlelo le-SAPS lokuqatjha kuzakungezelelwa amalunga azii-6 252 enyakeni weemali wee-2015/16 ukuqinisa imisebenzi yabasetjhi, isipholisa somphakathi, zobuhloli bobulelesi ukuqinisa imisebenzi yabasetjhi, zeforensikhi, ukufaka hlangana zokuphepa nokuvikela.
tgt: Nakong ya Kgwedi ya Lefa, Lefapha la Bonono le Botjhaba le tla hlophisa ho phetholwa ha lekote ho Sebaka sa Bahale Pretoria ho tshwaya qalo ya kaho ya monyumente wa naha o tla bontshang nako ya pele ho bokoloniale, ntwa ya tokoloho le bahale ba fapaneng ba lwanetseng kgatelopele ya kahisano.

src: Ungafumana ilwazi elinabileko ku: WEBTOKEINyanga yemiNyango kaRhulumende izakubanjwa emiNyagweni kaRhulumende yoke ngoKhukhulamungu ngaphasi kwesihloko esithi “Ukuragela iSewula Afrika Phambili: UkuLetha ImiNyango kaRhulumende ebantwini”.Inyanga le izakutshwaya imisebenzi karhulumende, ukuzinikela, ukuzibophelela nepumelelo yokulethwa kwezenzelo emphakathini.
tgt: Tlhahisoleseding e batsi e ka fimanwa ho WEBTOKEKgwedi ya selemo ka seng ya Tshebeletso ya Mmuso e tla ketekwa ho phatlalla le Tshebeletso ya Mmuso ka Loetse tlasa mookotaba “Re ntshetsa Aforika Borwa pele: Re isa Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba bathong”.Kgwedi ena e tla pepesa ditshebeletso tsa mmuso, boikemisetso, boitelo le boqhetseke ka hara phano ya ditshebeletso tsa setjhaba.

src: Kuzakunikelwa umbiko ngeragelophambili ngemva kwemihlangano yonyaka wee-2014 ngeminyango yombuso nemikhulumiswano nabasebenzi bombuso mayelana nokuvuselela indlela yokusebenza kwabasebenzi bakarhulumende.
tgt: Diphetho di tla fanwa mabapi le kgatelopele e entsweng ho latela dikopano tsa dipuisano tse phatlaletseng le ditherisano tsa phano ya ditshebeletso tsa 2014 ka basebeletsi ba ka sehloohong ba mmuso mabapi le ho “sibolla botjha tsela eo tshebeletso ya mmuso e sebetsang kateng”.

src: Umnyango karhulumende osebenza ngepumelelo usidingo esiqakathekileko sokuphumelelisa i-NDP begodu iKhabinethi yenza ibizelo kubasebenzi bombuso ukuzibophelela kabutjha ngemigomo ye-Batho Pele ngokunikela isizo lezinga eliphezulu, elongako neliphumelelako kiwo woke amaSewula Afrika.
tgt: Tshebeletso ya setjhaba e hlwahlwa ke tlhokeho ya bohlokwa bakeng sa ho nehela ho NDP mme Kabinete e ipiletsa ho basebeletsi ba setjhaba ho itlama botjha ho dipehelo tsa Batho Pele ka ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa maemo a hodimo, tse bolokang ditjeho le ho ba hlwahlwa ho maAforika Borwa oohle.

src: IKhabinethi yenza ibizelo kumaSewula Afrika ukubumbana basekele abagijimi bekhethu nabaphakamisela phezulu igama leSewula Afrika begodu benza isitjhaba sekhethu sizikhakhazise.
tgt: Kabinete e ipapisa le Moporesidente Zuma bakeng sa ho thoholetsa boraditaba ba SABC Dennis Tshetlhane le Sam Msibi bakeng sa ho hapa Mokgahlelo wa Thelevishene wa Dikgau tsa SADC tsa Boraditaba, le moithuti wa sekolo se phahameng Imbelani Matibe bakeng sa ho hlola Phehisanong ya Mokgahlelo wa Moqoqo wa Dikolo ya SADKabinete e leboha maAforika Borwa kaofela a ileng a kenela mekete ya Kgwedi ya Basadi.

src: IKhabinethi ifisela uNgqongqotjhe wezamaPhilo u-Aaron Motswaledi ongene ngepelaveke le e-Steve Biko Academic Hospital ePitoria ukuphola msinyana.

src: Amazwe awona asungule leligadango, yiSewula Afrika, ne-Brazil, ne-Indonesia, ne-Mexico, ne-Norway, ne-Philippines, ne-United Kingdom kunye ne-United States of America.
tgt: Aforika Borwa, Brazil, Indonesia, Mexico, Norway, Philippines, United Kingdom le Amerika ke tsona ditho tsa motheo tsa boikitlaetso bona.

src: Ngesikhathi sayo njengoSihlalo oDosa Phambili, iSewula Afrika izibophelela ngokuthi izakuphakamisa isithombe sobunjalo bepolitiki ye-OGP ukuqinisekisa ukuthi woke umuntu uba nelizwi nokuziphendulela ngakwenzako ezingeni leenKhulu zomBuso.
tgt: Nakong ya ho tshwara marapo jwaloka Modulasetulo ya ka Sehloohong, Aforika Borwa e itlama ho phahamisa maemo a sepolotiki a OGP ho netefatsa bonkakarolo le boikarabelo maemong a Dihlooho tsa Dipuso.

src: ISewula Afrika izakubuye iqalane nanomsebenzi wokufaka i-OGP ku-ajenda yamazwe ngamazwe eBandla leHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UNGA), nesiQhema samazwe ama-20 (i-G20) kunye nezinye iinkundla zokukhulumiselana.
tgt: Aforika Borwa hape e tla tsepamisa maikutlo bakeng sa ho kenyeletsa ka bobatsi OGP ka hara lenaneo la dinaha tse ngata tsa matjhaba ho Kopano Kakaretso (UNGA) ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba a Kopaneng (UN), Sehlopha sa ba 20 le mapatlelo a mang.

src: Umsebenzi wesiqhemesi uyabonakala, uyezwakala, ngoba solo sasungulwa ngo-2013, sikghonile ukwenza ukuthi kubotjhwe amasela weenyamazana amathandathu, saphungula ukuthiywa kweenyamazana ngama-76%, kwasuswa iinthiyo zeenyamazana eziyi-1000, kwavalwa imiraga emihlanu yamasela weenyamazana, kwavalwa namakhwitjhi amabili wemahlathini wenyama yeenyamazana.
tgt: Kgahlamelo ena e a bonahala hobane esale e thehwa ka 2013, yuniti ya batho ba 26 e thusitse ho tshwara ditsomi tse seng molaong tse tsheletseng, ya ho fokotsa ho tjhehwa ka 76%, le ho tlosa difi tse fetang 1 000, le ho fedisa dikampo tsa ditsomi tse seng molaong tse hlano le dikitjhini tse pedi tsa nama ya diphoofolo tse hlaha.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozisa labo amabizwabo aphakanyisiweko, nalabo abathumbileko kiboNongorwana beMbokodo 2015, emsebenzini ohlanganyelwe mNyango wezobuKghwari namaSiko nekoro yangeqadi.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa bakgethuwa le bahlodi ba Dikgau tsa Mbokodo tsa 2015, e leng semphato mahareng a Lefapha la Bonono le Setso le lekala la poraefete.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozisa isiKhulu esengamele ukuhlolwa kweencwadi eZiko leeMali eNarha uMma uZanele Mxunyelwa, othumbe unongorwana wokuba Mhloli ophume phambili emnyakeni wee-2015 yiHlangano yabaHloli bokuKhwabanisa ephakamise igama likaMxunyelwa njengomuntu othumbileko.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholeditse hlooho ya ditshebeletso tse ikgethang tsa bohlahlobi ya Lefapha la Matlotlo a Naha, Mofumahadi Zanele Mxunyelwa, ya kgethilweng ho ba Mohlahlobi wa Selemo ya filweng mangolo wa 2015 ke Mokgatlo wa Certified Fraud Examiners.

src: Lonongorwana-ke ufakazela ukuthi urhulumende uziphakamisile iinkhali namaqhinga alwisa ngawo ubukhohlakali nokukhwabanisa, nje-ke nalabo abasahlelela ukwenza ubukhohlakali nokukhwabanisa bayeleliswa ukuthi abasale sebalisa.
tgt: Kgau ena ya maemo a phahameng e tiisa hore mmuso o tiisitse letsoho ntweng e kgahlanong le boqhekanyetsi le bobodu, mme ba ntseng ba rera diketso tsa bobodu le boqhekanyetsi ba lemoswa hore ba tlohele ho etsa tseo.

src: IKhabinethi ibalilela imbiko bakwa-Vandeyar ngokubhujelwa ngomunye wakilomuzi, u-Reggie Vandeyar, owayemtjhotjhozeli wepolitiki owayephambili emajimeni amanengi wepolitiki eyayilwa ne-apartheid, ekubalwa hlangana nawo nejima lokwala ukuphatha amapasi, wabe wayokuvalelwa ejele ye-Robben Island itjhumi leminyaka.
tgt: Kabinete e fetsisa matshediso a yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya Reggie Vandeyar, molwanedi wa dipolotiki ya neng a le kapelepele matsholong a mangata, a kenyeletsang letsholo la nyatso le ho dula dilemo tse 10 Sehlekehlekeng sa Robben.

src: Uphekelelwe kiboyisemkhulu ngoSondo wamhlana ama-20 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2015 u-Vandeyar, ngesingcwabo esibe ngesiKhethekileko seemPhathimandla zemBusweni esiFundeni.
tgt: Kabinete e fetisetsa matshediso a yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya mofu Monghadi Wandile Dlamini ya hlokahetseng ka la 21 Loetse 2015.Ya nang a tumme ka lebitso la “Quesh” Monghadi Dlamini e ne e le molwanedi wa dipolotiki le setho sa mehleng sa Umkhonto we Sizwe.

src: Nababesekudingisweni, waba se-Lesotho, muva waba se-Zambia bekwaba nakufika isikhathi sokuvulwa kwe-ANC umlomo.
tgt: Monghadi Abraham Sonny-Boy Mahlangu jwaloka Motsamaisi wa Phethahatso: ICLekgotla la Tjhata ya ICT B-BBEE:6.

tgt: Monghadi Gavin Pieterse (Mokgatlo wa Thekenoloji yaTlhahisoleseding) leb.

src: IKoro ENcani Yezama-Elekthronikhi a. UNom Raletlhogonolo Andile Tlhoaele (we-Communications Cabling Association of Southern Africa) nob.
tgt: Monghadi Adrian Schofield (Setheo sa Ditsebi tsa Thekenoloji ya Tlhahisoleseding sa Aforika Borwa).

src: Mduduzi Odysseus Mkhonza (we-Black IT Forum).
tgt: Mokhanselara Katharina Pillay (Bolaodi bo Ipusang ba Dikgokahanyo ba Aforika Borwa).

src: IKoro ENcani Yetheknoloji YeLwazi a. UNom Gavin Pieterse (we-Information Technology Association) nob.
tgt: Mofumahadi Nokuzola Nelly Ehrens (Foramo ya Aforika Borwa ya Dikgokahanyo).

src: Adrian Schofield (we-Institute of Information Technology Professionals of South Africa).
tgt: Mofumahadi Morwesi Ramonyai (Batsamaisi ba Dikgwebo ba Batjha ba Aforika Borwa).

src: uNokuzola Nelly Ehrens (we-South African Communications Forum).
tgt: Monghadi Richard Charles Poulton (Mokgatlo wa Basebetsi ba Dikgokahanyo) leb.

src: Ilutjha Youtha.
tgt: Monghadi Tshepang Lesiba (Mokgatlo wa Basebetsi ba Dikgokahanyo).

src: IKhabinethi ithokozela ukuphumelela kwevakatjho lomsebenzi leSekela likaMengameli u-Cyril Rmaphosa e-Stockholm, e-Sweden, ukusukela mhlana ali-18 ukuyokufika mhlana ama-20 kuSewula wee-2015, la alekelelane khona ukuba nguSihlalo weSetjheni yeThoba yeKomitjhini eHlanganyelwe yiSewula Afrika ne-Sweden iKomitjhini leyo-ke ibe yasungula iKomidi eNcani yezeBhoduluko, zeGezi kunye nezaManzi.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela ho phethelwa ka katleho ha leeto la tshebetso ke Motlatsi wa Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa Stockholm, ho la Sweden ho tloha ka la 18 ho isa ka la 20 Mphalane 2015, mo e neng e le modulasetulo mmoho ho tulo ya bo-9 ya Khomishene ya Dinaha tse pedi ya Aforika Borwa-Sweden, e bakileng ho thakgolwa ha komiti e ka tlase ya tikoloho, eneji le metsi.

src: Ummongondaba lapha uveza igugu lamafa weSewula Afrika (wesikhathi esidlulileko newakhathesi), imvelo yayo yeemila neyeenyamazana kunye neyepumelelo yayo yomphakathi, kanti zinjalo nje zithomana kuhle khulu nendlela elandelwa ziinhlavu zemali ephasinizombelele.
tgt: a) Letoto la 2015 la Dikhoine tsa Sehopotso – Dilemo tse 200 tsa Sehopotso sa Dikhoine tsa Toropo ya Griquab) Letoto la 2015 le ketekang Khoine ya Aforika Borwa – Kokolofitwec) Letoto la 2016 la Protea – Bophelo ba Mohale: NR Mandelad) Letoto la 2016 la Tlhaho – Ditsomi tsa Bosiu (Phiri e Maroboko)e) Letoto la 2016 la Dihahabi tsa Aforika Borwa (Lempetje la Kapa)f) Letoto la 2016 la Bophelo ba Tlhaho (Bophelo ba Tlhaho ba Kapa Bophirima)g) Letoto la 2016 Silivera Series – Dibaka tsa Aforika tsa Mawatle tse Tshireleditsweng.

src: UmHlangano weenKhulu wee-2015 lo sewunatjisiwe kobanyana uzokungenelwa ngiwo woma-54 amazwe we-Afrika, kanti uzakuphakamisa irhwebo, ubuye urarulule nemiraro ekhona ngokufana emazweni la.
tgt: Kopano ya Aforika e tsamaisa Ditlhakiso tsa Boikwetliso ba Naheng ba AMANI AFRICA (Kgotso ka hara Aforika) II Setsing sa Lebotho la Ntwa la Aforika Borwa se Lohatla ho la Kapa Leboya ho tloha ka la 19 Mphalane ho isa ka la 7 Pudungwana 2015.Ho akanngwa ditho tse 5 400 ho tswa sesoleng, sepoleseng le ditheong tsa badudi tse emetseng e hlano tsa Mekgatlo ya Moruo ya Lebatowa la AU hore di tla nka karolo ditlhakisong tsena.

src: Bazii-801 688 abafundi bakaMethrikhi abarejistarele ukutlola iinhlahlubo zokuphela komnyaka kilababafundi, abazii-674 232 babo bafundi abafunda isikhathi esipheleleko, bese kuthi abayi-127 456 babe bafundi abafunda basekhaya.
tgt: GovTech 2015 e tla tshwarwa ho tloha ka la 25 ho isa ka la 28 Mphalane 2015 tlasa mookotaba: “Bomphato bakeng sa Phano ya Tshebeletso”, ka mookotaba wa tlatsetso wa ‘Re ikgokahanya le Badudi bakeng sa Ntshetsopele le Kgolo’.Se tla be hape se kenyeleditse le ho thakgolwa ha Dikgau tsa Phano ya Tshebeletso tsa ICSe tshehetsa ‘South Africa Connect’, jwaloka ha e tsebisitswe ke Moporesidente Jacob Zuma nakong ya Puo ya hae ya Setjhaba ya 2014, ka ho fana ka lepatlelo la ho fumana ditharollo tse kgonehang le tse tswetseng pele ho setjhaba se tswelang pele se sebedisang disebediswa tsa ICKabinete e tjhaelletse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Beke ya Naha ya Imbizo ya ho Tsepamisa Maikutlo ho tloha ka la 30 Pudungwana ho isa ka la 6 Tshitwe 2015 tlasa mookotaba: “Mmoho re Ntshetsa Aforika Borwa Pele”.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozela imiphumela yomNyaka wee-2015/16 yeKomba yokuPhalisana ePhasinizombelele eKundleni yezomNotho yePhasi lOke (i-WEF) yona etjengise ukuthi iSewula Afrika ikhuphuke ngeengaba ezilikhomba, ukusukela ema-56 ukuyokufika ema-49 hlangana namazwe ali-140.
tgt: Kabinete e lakaletsa Amajimbos tse molemo jwaloka ha ba le phehisanong ya Mohope wa Lefatshe wa FIFA wa U-17 FIFA Chile ho tloha ka la 17 Mphalane ho isa ka la 8 Pudungwana 2015.Kabinete e thoholetsa Orlando Pirates bakeng sa ho fihlella makgaolakgang a Mohope wa 2015 Orange CAF Confederation le Banyana Banyana bakeng sa ho atleha ho kenela Dipapadi tsa Diolimpiki tsa 20.6 Kabinete hape e fetisetsa matshediso ho lelapa le metswalle ya CEO ya mehleng ya Komiti ya Lehae ya Ditlhophiso ya Mohope wa Dinaha tsa Aforika (Afcon) wa 2013 le Bompodi ba Dinaha tsa Aforika (Chan) hape e ne e le Mohlanka wa Phethahatso wa SABC‚ Mvuzo Mbebe ya hlokahetseng bosiung ba Mantaha.7 Kabinete e utlwisitswe bohloko haholo ka ho hlokahala ha Mlungisi Sisulu, mora wa bobedi wa Walter le Albertina Sisulu, mme e fetisetsa matshediso a yona ho lelapa le metswalle.

src: Ubungcono obukhulukhulu obenziwe yiSewula Afrika benzeke kilamakoro alandelako: Zepilo nezefundo esisekelo (ikhuphuke ngeengaba ezintandathu), ukusebenza kuhle emakethe yeensebenzi (ikhuphuke ngeengaba ezintandathu), ukulungela itheknonoloji (ikhuphuke iingaba ezili-16), kunye namandla wokusungula (ikhuphuke ngeengaba ezihlanu).
tgt: Monghadi Sisulu o bapetse karolo e matla makaleng a ANC a bokgukguni dilemong tsa bo 1980, a patile diyuniti tsa Umkhonto weSizwe lebenkeleng la hae le lenyenyane la Soweto‚ le neng le tsejwa e le Shop 7‚ a behile bophelo ba hae kotsing e kgolo.

src: IKhabinethi yemukela ukuhlonywa nguMengameli u-Jacob Zuma isentha yemiSebenzi eHlanganyelweko eSkukuza.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela ho thakgolwa ha Setsi se Kopanetsweng sa Tshebetso ke Moporesidente Jacob Zuma ho la Skukuza.

src: IKhabinethi ivumele ukubuyekezwa komrholo wamalunga weKomitjhini yamaLungelo woBuntu eSewula Afrika ngama-5.5% (i-SAHRC) ukuthoma mhla li-1 kuSihlabantakana enyakeni wee-2015.
tgt: Nehelano e kang ena e etsa karolo ya ho bebofatsa ho kenella mebarakeng bakeng sa ditshebeletso le bafani ba ditshebeletso ka hara mebaraka eo e seng ya di-LDKabinete e tjhaelletse monwana moputso o lekotsweng botjha wa ho hlopha botjha tjhelete e phedisang ya 5.5% e lokelang ho lefuwa ditho tsa Khomishene ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Aforika Borwa (SAHRC) ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2015.

src: Lokhu kukhambisana nesiGaba se-9(1) somThetho we-SAHRC we-2013 (umThetho wama-40 wee-2013).
tgt: Sena se imatahantse le Karolo 9(1) ya Molao wa SAHRC, wa 2013 (Molao 40 wa 2013).

src: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa komBiko weSewula Afrika wesiKhatjana ngaphasi kweTjhatha ye-Afrika ymaLungelo woBuntu nomBiko wokuThoma ngaphasi kweKambiso yeTjhatha yamaLungelo waboMma e-Afrika.
tgt: Kabinete e tjhaelletse monwana ho kenngwa ha Tlaleho ya Dinako tse itseng e Kopanetsweng ya Bobedi tlasa Tjhata ya Aforika e mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho le tsa Botho le Tlaleho ya Qalo tlasa Porothokhole ya Tjhata ya Aforika e mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Basadi ka hara Aforika.

src: UMengameli uzakuvakatjhela uMengameli uzakuvakatjhela uMengameli u-Joachim Gauck.
tgt: Moporesidente hape o tla nka leeto la hlompho ho ya ho Moporesidente Joachim Gauck.

src: ISewula Afrika izakubamba umnyanya weForamu yeTjhebiswano le-China ne-Afrika eJwanasbhege mhlana ama-4 ukufikela nakama-5 kuNobayeni enyakeni wee-2015.
tgt: Aforika Borwa e tla tshwara Seboka sa Foramo ya Tshebedisano-mmoho ya China-Aforika ho la Johannesburg ka la 4 le 5 Tshitwe 2015.

src: Inani lemizi ezii-16 600 liyazuza kusiGaba-1 sephrojekthi karhulumende endaweni leyo eletha amanzi ezabelweni ezima-24 kuMasipala weNdawo we-Bushbuckridge.
tgt: Palo e etsang malapa a 16 600 e kgola molemo ho tswa ho Mokgahlelo 1 wa porojeke ya metsi ya mmuso ka hara tulo ena, e fanang ka metsi metsaneng e 24 ka hara Masepala wa Lehae wa the Bushbuckridge.

src: Hlangana nonyaka wee-2002 newee-2014, amaphesenti wemizi efumana amanzi ikhule ukusukela kumaphesenti ama-80 ukufikela kama-86, kanti ukukhanjiswa kwendle kukhule ukusukela kumaphesenti ama-62 ukufikela kama-80.
tgt: Moporesidente Zuma o tla kenela ho behwa setulong ha Moporesidente ya sa tswa kgethwa wa Riphaboliki e Kopaneng ya Tanzania, Mohlomphehi Monghadi John Pembe Magufuli, ka la 5 Pudungwana Molaetsa wa Ditakaletso tsa Mahlohonolo.

src: UMengameli uZuma uzakukhambela ukubekwa esitulweni kukaMengameli we-United Republic of Tanzania, uMhlonitjhwa uNom.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa basebeletsi ba setjhaba ba kgethilweng ho Dikgau tsa Boraro tsa Naha tsa Boqhetseke tsa Batho Pele.

src: John Pembe Magufuli, mhlana ama- 5 kuSinyikhaba enyakeni wee- Umlayezo wokuthokozisa.
tgt: Mokete wa Dikgau o tshwarwa ka la 13 Pudungwana 2015 Emperor’s Palace, ho la Gauteng tlasa mookotaba: “Batho Pele – Re beha Batho Pele”.

src: U-Michael Meyer wathumba imendlela yesiliva ebangeni lalamitha ama-200.
tgt: Michael Meyer o hapile silivera ho dimithara tse 200 tsa lebelo la motswako la bo mong.

src: U-Douglas Erasmus uthumbe imendlela yethusi ebangeni elirhabako lamamitha ama-50 le-freestyle.
tgt: Douglas Erasmus o hapile medale wa boronse ho lebelo la boikgethelo le potlakileng la dimithara tse Kaylene Corbett e bile wa borobedi ho lebelo la makgaolakgang la dimithara tse 50 la ho sesa ka mokokotlo ha Calvyn Justus le yena a phethetse borobeding ho lebelo la dimithara tse 200 la boikgethelo.

src: IKhabinethi yemukela abajameli abeze kuKhomferensi yesiNe yePhaliswano leenTjhaba ze-BRICS ukusukela nakali-12 ukufikela nakali-13 kuSinyikhaba enyakeni wee-2015 e-Inkosi Albert Luthuli Convention Centre, e-Durban ngaphasi kwesihloko esithi: “IPhaliswano nokuKhula komNotho”.Ukuhlanganisa abosolwazi bezomthetho wephaliswano ukuqala bonyana umthethomgomo wephaliswano ungasiza bunjani ekukhuleni komnotho emazweni we-BRICS (i-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India, i-China neSewula Afrika).Umthetho weSewula Afrika oqinileko wezamaphaliswano ukghonakalisa izakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika ukuzibandakanya ngefanelo emnothweni welizwe.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela kemedi e kenetseng Khonferense ya BRICS ya Bone ya Matjhaba ya Phehisano ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 13 Pudungwana WEBTOKENtsing sa Dikopano sa Inkosi Albert Luthuli, ho la Durban tlasa mookotaba: “Phehisano le Kgolo e Kenyeletsang”.Sena se bokanya mmoho ditsebi ho tsa molao wa phehisano bakeng sa ho sekaseka kamoo leano la phehisano le ka nyehelang ho kgolo e kenyeletsang le ntshetsopele ya moruo ka hara dinaha tsa BRICS (Brazil, Russia, India, China le Aforika Borwa).Taolo e matla ya diphehisano ya Aforika Borwa e kgontsha baahi ho nka karolo ka ho hloka leeme moruong wa naha.

src: ISewula Afrika yazibophelela ukwehlisa iingozi zendlela ngamaphesenti ama-50 ukusukela eenkulungwaneni ezili-13 967 ukwehlela kezili-7 000 ngonyaka wee- 2020.
tgt: Letona la Dipalangwang Dipuo Peters le tla kenela Khonferense ya Bobedi ya Lefatshe ya Matona a Dipalangwang ho tloha ka la 18 ho isa ho la 20 Pudungwana 2015 ho la Brazil, moo Aforika Borwa e tla teka Tlaleho ya Nako e Bohareng ya Naha mabapi le kgatelopele e entsweng bakeng sa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Lefatshe wa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba a Kopaneng wa Dilemo tse Leshome tsa ho Sebetsana le Boipaballo Mebileng wa 2011-2020.Aforika Borwa e itlamme ho fokotsa dikotsi tsa mebileng ka 50% ho tloha ho tse 13 967 ho ya ho tse ka tlase ho 7 000 ka 2020.

src: ISewula Afrika iyaphumelela ekufikeleleni eminqopheni ehlathululwe kuHlelo lokuSebenza ngokuPhepha eeNdleleni lemiNyaka eliTjhumi (2011-2020) kuHlelo nofana kuneentjhijilo eziqalene nelizwe.
tgt: Aforika Borwa e etsa menyabuketso ya bohlokwa bakeng sa ho fihlella dipheo tsa yona jwaloka ka ha di hlahella ho Moralo wa Lefatshe wa Dilemo tse Leshome tsa ho Sebetsana le Boipaballo Mebileng wa 2011-2020, ho sa natswe diphephetso tseo hajwale naha e tobaneng le tsona.

src: IKhabinethi yemukela ukungenelela komNyango wezaManzi nokuKhanjiswa kwendle ngokusiza imiphakathi ye-KwaZulu-Natal neFreyistata esahlelwe sisomiso.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela boitshunyako ba Lefapha la Metsi le Dikgwerekgwere bakeng sa ho thusa badudi ho la KwaZulu-Natal le Foreistata ba anngweng ke komello ya moraorao tjena.

src: Iindawo ezisekelwa madamu amakhulu ngamanzi zisesenawo amanzi ngombana amadamu la asesebujameni obuhle ngamanzi aseleko okwenza isilinganiso samanzi ngenarheni sibe kuma-66 yamaphesenti.
tgt: Dibaka tse fepelwang ke matamo a maholwanyane a lebatowa a naha le dikema di dutse di ntse di bolokehile kaha ditsamaiso tsena hajwale di na le botsitso bo botle ba palohare ya poloko ya metsi a tletseng ka 66%.Kabinete e amohela ho thehwa ha Komiti e Kopanetsweng ya Matona (IMC) e mabapi le Polokeho ya Metsi bodulasetulong ba Letona la Kopanelo ya Puso le Merero ya Botjhaba Pravin Gordhan.

src: IKhabinethi izwe ubuhlungu ngokudlula ephasini kungakalindeleki kukaChumani Nqakula, oyindodana kaNgqongqotjhe wezokuVikela naboMakadabona bePi uNosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula no-Charles Nqakula, iLunga lePalamende.
tgt: Kabinete e utlwisitswe bohloko ke lefu la tshohanyetso la Chumani Nqakula, mora wa Letona la Tshireletso le Mekaubere ya Ntwa Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula le Charles Nqakula, e leng Setho sa Palamente.

src: Mogojare Richard Seleka njengemNqophisi Zombelele (i-DG) emNyangweni wezamaBubulo kaRhulumende no-2.
tgt: Monghadi Mogojare Richard Seleka jwaloka Motsamaisi e Moholo (DG) ho Lefapha la Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba le.

src: Robert Moeketsa Ramasodi njengeSekela le-DG: imiKhiqizo yezokuLima, zamaPhilo nokuFumaneka kokuDla emNyangweni wezokuLima, zamaHlathi nezeenHlambi.
tgt: Monghadi Robert Moeketsa Ramasodi jwaloka motlatsi wa DG: Tlhahiso ya tsa Temo, Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho ya Dijo ho Lefapha la Temo, Meru le Ditlhapi.

src: IBhodi yeKoporasi yokuLawulwa kweeNdlela:a) UMm.
tgt: Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Sephethephethe sa Mebileng:a) Mofumahadi Daphline Harridene Charlotte-Ann Ewertse – Setho seo e seng sa Phethahatso leb) Monghadi Thulani Matiki Norman Kgomo – Setho seo e seng sa Phethahatso.

src: Daphline Harridene Charlotte-Ann Ewertse – iLunga elinganasiKhundla sokuPhatha no-b) Nom.
tgt: Boto ya Koporasi ya Matsete a Setjhaba:a) Mofumahadi Lindiwe Toyi – Motsamaisi eo e seng wa Phethahatsob) Mofumahadi Sandra Beswick – Motsamaisi eo e seng wa Phethahatsoc) Ms Tantaswa Fubu – Motsamaisi eo e seng wa Phethahatsod) Ngaka Claudia Manning – Motsamaisi eo e seng wa Phethahatsoe) Monghadi Pitsi Paul Moloto – Motsamaisi eo e seng wa Phethahatso

src: Thulani Matiki Norman Kgomo – iLunga elinganasiKhundla sokuPhatha.
tgt: lef) Mofumahadi Matshepo Faith More – o thontswe hape jwaloka Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong wa Ditjhelete.

src: IBhodi yeKoporasi yokuTjalwa kweeMali zomBuso:a) Mma.
tgt: Boto ya Lekala la Ntshetsopele ya Matlo:a) Monghadi Mavuso Walter Msimang – Modulasetulob) Monghadi Maanda Emmanuel Mutheiwanac) Monghadi Pravin Amar Singhd) Monghadi Thuthuka Siphumezile Songelwa lee) Monghadi Nkululeko Nkosingiphile Vilakazi – moemedi wa Letona la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba.

src: Abosaziwako beSewula Afrika bahlanganyela namabubulo, kufaka hlangana abomeyara neemphathimandla zikaMasipala weSiyingi seSedibeng ekupendeni nekulungiseni iingadi mhlana kuhlonywa izindlu esele zakhiwe.
tgt: MaAforika Borwa a itlhommeng pele a ile a ikopanya le bankakrolo ba diindaseteri, ho kenyeletswa le bomeyara le bahlanka ba tswang Masepaleng wa Setereke wa Sedibeng, mabapi le ho penta matlo a phethetsweng mmoho le ho thusa ka ditshingwana nakong ya ho thakgolwa.

src: Kwakhiwe izindlu ezipheze zibe zii-18 000, okuzokuzuza kizo abalupheleko, abantu abakhubazekileko nemizi etlhogonyelwa bentwana netlhogonyelwa bomma.
tgt: Ho ahilwe matlo a ka bang 18 000, a tswetseng molemo maqheku, batho ba qhwadileng, le malapa ao dihlooho tsa ona e leng bana le basadi.

src: IKhabinethi ibuye yemukela isimemezelo esithi umnyango uzokuhloma iphrojekthi yokwakhiwa kwezindlu ezizinkulungwana ezima-60 000 ngonyaka ozako.2 IKhabinethi yemukela iragelophambili eyenziwe yiprojekthi i-Tshepo 10 000 , esiza ukuphelisa ukutlhayela kwemisebenzi kulutjha eDorobheni yeTshwane.
tgt: Kabinete e boetse e amohela tsebiso ya hore selemong se tlang lefapha le tla thakgola porojeke, e tla etsa hore ho ahuwe matlo a 60 000.

src: Iphrojekthi le yeengidigidi zamaranda yeDorobha yeTshwane ngokusebenzisana neYunivesithi yePitori, inqophe ukubandula ilutjha elingasebenziko elizii-10 000 ngokulinikela amakghonofundwa nelemuko elitlhogekako bonyana bafake iimbawo zamathenda wamaphrojekthi.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela kgatelopele e entsweng ke porojeke ya Tshepo 10 000, e thusang ho fedisa tlhokeho ya mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha ka hara Motsemoholo wa Tshwane.

src: Imihlangano yeVeke yeziMbizo zeliZwe Loke izakubanjwa ngaphasi kwesihloko esithi: “Sisoke siragela iSewula Afrika phambili” begodu izakubikela imiphakathi ngokuphunyeleliswa kweQhinga lamaPhuzu aliThoba likarhulumende ekuphembeni ukukhula komnotho nokuvula imisebenzi ngokutjho kukaMengameli eKulumeni yobuJamo beNarha kaVelabahlinze enyakeni we-2015.
tgt: Moporesidente Zuma o tla thakgola Letsholo la Matsatsi a 16 bakeng sa thibelo ya Dikgoka kgahlanong le Basadi le Bana ka la 25 Pudungwana 2015 Naauwpoort, ho la Mahikeng tlasa mookotaba: “Mpalle le nna: Mmoho re Ntshetsapele Aforika Borwa e hlokang Dikgoka.” Letsholo lena le hopolwa jwaloka karolo ya Matsatsi a 365 a Twantsho, leo e leng letsholo le tswellang le lemosang ka dikgoka kgahlanong le basadi le bana, le ho elellwisa batho hore ba balellwe twantshong ya selemo ho pota.

src: Iimvumelwano ezitlikitliweko zifaka hlangana amabhiliyoni ali-R12 wokwakha iziko lokukhiqizwa kweenkoloyi, imali eziingidi ezima-US$500 ebolekwe i-Eskom ngomnqopho wokuthuthukisa umthangalasisekelo nesiqinisekiso samabhiliyoni ama-US$2.5 wokusekela i-Transnet yiBhanga yezeTuthuko ye-China.
tgt: Ditumellano tse saennweng di kenyeleditse R12 bilione bakeng sa ho aha polante ya tlhahiso ya makoloi ka hara Aforika Borwa, thuso ya kadimo ya US$500 milione ho Eskom bakeng sa ntshetsopele ya meralo wa motheo le tiisetso ya thuso ya ditjhelete ya US$2.5 bilione bakeng sa Transnet ho tswa ho Banka ya Ntshetsopele ya China.

src: Njengengcenye yesiBili yeForamu yeTjhebiswano le-China ne-Afrika (i-FOCAC), uMengameli u-Xi Jinping uzibophelele ngamabhiliyoni ama-US$60 ukuthuthukisa i-Afrika.
tgt: Jwaloka karolo ya Foramo ya bo-2 e mabapi le Tshebedisano-mmoho ya China-Aforika (FOCAC), Moporesidente Xi Jinping o entse boitlamo ba US$60 bilione bakeng sa ntshetsopele ya Aforika.

src: Ukwamukelwa komTlamo wokwEnza omuTjha (womnyaka wee-2016 ukufikela kewee-2018) emhlanganweni we-FOCAC kuqinisa ukukhula kwetjhebiswano hlangana ne-China ne-Afrika, okuzakuvula amathuba amatjha wokurhwebelana nokutjalwa kweemali ekuliqhinga elizakukhuphula umnotho.
tgt: Kamohelo ya Tumellano le Moralo wa Tshebetso wa (2016-2018) ho FOCAC o matlafatsa bosemphato bo ntseng bo hola ba kutlwano pakeng tsa Aforika le China, bo tla bula menyetla e metjha ya kgwebisano le matsete bakeng sa ho rotetsa kgolo ya moruo.

src: Umnotho ufumene ukusekelwa okubonakalako lokha iHlangano ye-BMW yeSewula Afrika imemezela ukutjala imali emabhiliyoni asi-R6 ezikweni layo elise-Rosslyn, ePitori, okubufakazi ngetjhebiswano eliqakathekileko elikhona hlangana kombuso namabhizinisi nendima ebanjwa mabhizinisi ekuthuthukisweni komnotho.
tgt: Moruo o boetse o fumane matlafatso ya moruo ka tsebiso ya Mokgatlo wa BMW wa Aforika Borwa ya matsete a R6 bilione polanteng ya ona e Rosslyn, ho la Pretoria, e leng bopaki ba semphato sa bohlokwa se teng pakeng tsa dikgwebo le mmuso, le karolo e bapalwang ke dikgwebo ntshetsopeleng ya moruo.

src: NgeLesibili, nakabu-8 kuNobayeni, uMengameli uZuma wanikela ngaboNongorwana beNarha kuzakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika nabosaziwako bangaphetjheya abafake isandla ekuthuthukisweni kobuntu.
tgt: Ka Labobedi la, 8 Tshitwe, Moporesidente Zuma o abile Ditlotlo tsa Naha ho baahi ba Aforika Borwa le melata e hlahelletseng ka mahetla ba nyehetseng bakeng sa matlafatso ya batho.

src: Blade Nzimande nabatjhebisani be-BRICS – i-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India ne-China – sinqophe ukutlama itlhatlha lokusebenzisana kezefundo esikhathini esizako.
tgt: Tumellano e saenetsweng ka kopanelo pakeng tsa Letona la Thuto e Phahameng le Thupello, Ngaka Blade Nzimande, le bomphato ba BRICS – Brazil, Russia, India le China – e reretswe ho ntshetsapele moralo bakeng sa tshebedisano ya bokamoso thutong.

src: Isivumelwanesi sifaka hlangana ifundo mazombe, amaqhinga womthethomgomo wezefundo, amakholiji weBandulo leTheknikhali (ama-TVET) nefundo ephakemeko.
tgt: Tumellano e akaretsa thuto ya kakaretso, lewa la leano la thuto, Dikoletjhe tsa Thuto le Thupello ya Tekginiki le Mesebetsi (TVET) le thuto e phahameng.

src: UmNyango wezeSayensi neThekhnoloji wabamba iForamu yeSayensi yeSewula Afrika ngaphasi kwesihloko esithi “Ukulumathisa imikhulumiswano ngesayensi”.
tgt: Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloji le ne le tshwere Foramo ya Saense ya Aforika Borwa tlasa mookotaba “Re hotetsa dipuisano ka saense”.

src: Imithethomgomo le ikhambisana nomgomo wetuthuko eragako okusisekelo se-Vision 2030 eku-NDP.3 Njengoba lo kumhlangano weKhabinethi wokugcina emnyakeni wee-2015, IKhabinethi idlulisa iimfiselabuhle zayo kiwo woke amaSewula Afrika esikhathni esizako seholideyi kakresimusi.
tgt: Moporesidente Zuma o tla etella pele mekete ya Letsatsi la Poelano ka la 16 December Port Elizabeth, ho la Kapa Botjhabela tlasa mookotaba: “Re ngotla karohano: Re aha bosetjhaba ba Aforika Borwa bo tshwanang ho ya ho puso ya naha e tswelang pele”.

src: Ngokukhambisana nomoya woBuntu, IKhabinethi yenza isimemezelo kiwo woke amaSewula Afrika ukobana asize abantu nemindeni etlhagako emphakathini.
tgt: Letona la Dikgokahanyo tsa Mehala le Ditshebeletso tsa Poso, Ngaka Siyabonga Cwele, o tla etelle pele kemedi ya Aforika Borwa ho UNGA mabapi le Seboka sa Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Tlhahisoleseding (WSIS) ho tloha ka la 15 ho isa ka la 16 Tshitwe 2015, moo maemo a Aforika Borwa a naha, a nyehelang ho WSIS+10 a tla hlahiswa ka ntle le Pampiri.

src: C Mbandeg) Mma TF Maenetja noh) Mma.
tgt: Boto ya Metsi ya Amatola:a) Mofumahadi NN Mnqeta (Modulasetulo)b) Monghadi A Hadebe (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo)c) Monghadi EV Joosted) Monghadi AP Le Rouxe) Monghadi BE Hollingworthf) Monghadi C Mbandeg) Mofumahadi TF Maenetjah) Mofumahadi M Nzimande lei) Moporofesara L Louw.

tgt: Boto ya Dikema tsa Tshebeletso ya Bobuelli ba Badudi:a) Monghadi Vukile Charles Mehana, (o thontswe hape e le Modulasetulo)b) Mofumahadi Beauty Nomhle Dambuzac) Monghadi Bhekumusa Gorden Dlaminid) Taureen Dylan Holmese) Rajesh Jockf) Oupa Moshongoane Moshebi leg) Nomazotsho Yvonne Memani (o thontswe hape).

src: Abram Stefanus Hanekome) Mma.
tgt: Mofumahadi Thulisile Glory Manzini jwaloka DDG: Tsamaiso ho DTPS.

src: UNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali u-Pravin Gordhan uzakwethula amagadango la lokha nakethula iKulumo yeSabelo seeMali mhlana ama-24 kuMhlolanja Ukusekelwa ngeemali kweFundo ePhakemekoIKhabinethi ivumele iinkhibelelo kusabelomali selizwe loke lapho kuzokutjhidiswa iimali bonyana kusizwe amayunivesithi ngaphandle kokwephula iinlinganiso zeendleko ezamenyezelwa ngaphambilini.
tgt: Letona la Ditjhelete Pravin Gordhan le tla kgakola mekgwa e tla nkuwa ha a tla be a teka ditekanyetso tsa naha ka la 24 Tlhakola Matlole bakeng sa Thuto e PhahamengKabinete e tjhaelletse monwana dihlomathiso ho dikabo tsa ditekanyetso tsa naha tse tla suthisa mehlodi ya ho thusa diyunivesithi ka matlole ntle le ho tlola meedi ya tshebediso ya tjhelete e phatlaladitsweng pejana.

src: UMengameli u-Jacob Zuma noNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko nokuBandula bahlathulule mhlaphanje bonyana izabelwezi zizakuvala isikhala sokungakhutjhulwa kweemali zonyaka lo wefundo okwavunyelwana ngakho, kwesulwe isikolodo sesiKhwama seSizo leeMali kubaFundi seliZweloke (i-NSFAS) nokukhandela ukukhula kwesikolodwesi esikhathini sesabelo seemali esibekiweko.
tgt: Moporesidente Jacob Zuma le Letona la Thuto e Phahameng le Thupello Blade Nzimande haufinyana tjena ba tshwaile hore dikabo tsena di tla akaretsa ho se nyolohe ha ditefello hoo ho dumellanweng ka hona bakeng sa selemo sa hajwale sa dithuto, ho tlosa mokitlane oo esale o bokellana o kolotwang ke baithuti ba Sekema sa Naha sa Dithuso tsa Ditjhelete tsa Baithuti (NSFAS) le ho thibela ho bokellana ha mokitlane o jwalo bakeng sa nako e bohareng.

src: Amagadango wokungenelela la ayikomba nemiphumela yemikhulumiswano eyathoma ngoSewula emnyakeni wee-2015 nesaragako.
tgt: Mekgwa ena ya boitshunyako ke karabelo ho ditherisano tse ngatanyana tse qadileng ka Phato2015 mme di ntse di tswella.

src: UNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko nokuBandula nesiqhema sakhe seemphathimandla zomnyango sele abambe imihlangano ebalwako nabarholi be-SASCO, yoke imiKhandlu eJamele abaFundi, iForamu yamaYunivesithi weSewula Afrika, iHlangano yeBumbano labaFundi yeSewula, abaPhathi aziinHloko zama--SETA, iThungelelwano leTjhuguluko kezeFundo ePhakemeko neKomiti yePalamende eqalene neFundo ePhakemeko.
tgt: Letona la Thuto e Phahameng le Thupello mmoho le sehlopha sa hae sa bolaodi ba tshwere dikopano tse ngatanyana le ketapele ya SASCO, Makgotla kaofela a Baemedi ba Baithuti, Foramo ya Diyunivesithi ya Aforika Borwa, Kopano ya Baithuti ya Aforika Borwa, diCEO tsadiSETA, Mokgatlo wa Diphethoho tsa Thuto e Phahameng le komiti ya Palamente e ikarabellang bakeng sa thuto e phahameng.

src: Emnyakeni weemali wee-2016/17, urhulumende ubekele ngeqadi amabhiliyoni ama-R.543 avela esikhwameni sombuso khona azakwabela i-NSFAS kuthi yona iboleke abafundi abazii-71 753 abalungele ukufumana isizo leemali ku-NSFAS, kodwana akhange basizwe ngokupheleleko namkha akhange basizwe nakanye eminyakeni yefundo emithathu edlulileko.
tgt: Jwaloka mokgwa o potlakileng, R.33 bilione e abilwe bakeng sa ho rarolla kgaello e mabapi le matlole a tshebetso a diyunivesithi ka lebaka la tumellano ya keketseho ya ditefello tsa 0% bakeng sa Selemong sa ditjhelete sa 2016/17, mmuso o phetile botjha ho beha ka sehloohongR.543 bilione ya matlole a mmuso a tla abelwa NSFAS bakeng sa ho fana ka dikadimo ho thusa baithuti ba 71 753 ba hlwailweng ho tshwanelwa ke dithuso tsa NSFAS empa ka mohlomong ba ile ba thola thuso e haellang kapa ba sa e tholang ho hang dilemong tse tharo tse fetileng tsa dithuto.

src: I-NSG yasungulwa ngowee-2013, yajamiselela isiKolo sokuFundisa ngobuRholi bokuPhatha nokuLawula umSebenzi wemBusweni (i-PALAMA), kanti-ke ithunywe ukukhuthaza ukuphunyeleliswa kancanikancani kwamagugu nekambisolawulo elawula imisebenzi yombuso, iphakamise nezinga, inabise negalelo lokuthuthukiswa kwemithombo yamandla yeensebenzi eenjamisweni.
tgt: Kabinete e tjhaelletse monwana tshebediso ya basebeletsi ba mmuso ba behileng meja fatshe le ba ntseng ba sebetsa jwaloka barupelli ho Sekolothupello sa Naha sa Mmuso (NSG).NSG e ile ya thakgolwa ka 2013, e nka sebaka sa Akhademi ya Boetapele ba Tsamaiso ya Setjhaba le Bolaodi (PALAMA), mme e romilwe ho hodisa temoho e tswetseng pele ya boleng le dipehelo tse laolang tsamaiso ya setjhaba le ho matlafatsa boleng, bophara le kgahlamelo ya ntshetsopele ya mehlodi ya bokgoni ba batho dikahong tsa mmuso.

src: IKhabinethi iphasise umBiko weliZwe wesiGaba sokuGcina sesi-3 ngokuPhunyeleliswa kweHlangano YokuSebenzisana nokuThuthukiswa komNotho (i-OECD) (isiVumelwano esiLwa nokuFunjathiswa ).LomBiko-ke uzokudluliselwa esiQhemeni se-OECD esiLwa nokuFunjathiswa.
tgt: Kabinete e tjhaelletse monwana Tlaleho ya Qetelo ya Mokgahlelo 3 ya Aforika Borwa ya Naha ya ho Kenngwa Tshebetsong ya Mokgatlo wa Tshebedisano-mmoho le Ntshetsopele (OECD) (Khonvenshene e Kgahlanong le Tjotjo).Tlaleho e lokela ho kenngwa ho Sehlopha sa Tshebetso sa OECD sa Tjotjo.

src: Umbiko lo wendlala indima eyenziwe mbuso emagadangweni wawo wokukhalima umukghwa wokufunjathiswa owenziwa maphandle lokho-ke umbuso ukwenza ngokuthola izenzo ezinjalo, uziphenye, zivulelwe amacala namkha zibotjhiswe.
tgt: Tlaleho e hlakisa kgatelopele e entsweng ke mmuso boitshunyakong ba ona ba ho thibela tjotjo dinaheng tsa ka ntle ka ho e fokisa, ho e fuputsa le ho e tjhutjhisa.

src: Ukudlula lapho, umbiko uphakamisa negadango elithethweko lokulemukisa ngalomhlobo wecala.
tgt: Tlaleho hape e hlakisa boikitlaetso bo nkuweng ho hlahisa temoso ka botlokotsebe bona.7 Kabinete e tjhaelletse monwana hore Lefapha la Merero ya Lehae (DHA) le kenyeletswe ka tlasa Lepheo la Toka, Thibelo ya Botlokotsebe le Polokeho.

src: NgoMgqibelo wamhlana ama-20 kuMhlolanja kowee-2016, iSekela likaMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa uzokuthwala ibandla leenthunywa zaboNgqongqotjhe kuyiwe eMQalisweni We-Ofisi LikaMengameli WokuThuthukisa ILutjha, ozabe ubanjelwe esontweni i-Grace Bible Church, e-Pimville e-Soweto.
tgt: Ka Moqebelo, 20 Hlakola 2016, Motlatsi wa Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o tla etella pele kemedi ya Matona ho Dipontsho tsa Boporesidente tsa Ntshetsopele ya Batjha Kerekeng ya Grace Bible Pimville, ho la Soweto.

src: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuthi iKomitjhini yamaLungelo wobuNtu yalapha eSewula Afrika ingabamba umHlangano wokuBonisana ngokuVikelwa kwabaNtu abeNyula zomSeme ngeNdlela yabo, ubuNjalo boBulili kunye naMandla wokuZwakalisa lokho abangikho umhlangano lo uyokubanjwa mhlana ama-3 ukuyokufika mhlana ama-5 kuNtaka wee-2016.
tgt: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Seminara ya Lebatowa la Aforika ya Tshireletso ya Batho e itshetlehileng ho Tshekamelo ya tsa Motabo, Boitsebiso ba Bong le ho Ipolela, ke Khomishene ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Aforika Borwa, ho tloha ka la 3 ho isa la 5 March 2016.Seminara e kgothaletsa dipuisano ho theha kutlwisiso e batlang e ba matla ya motso wa disosa le ho itjala ha diphephetso tsa hore ho tle ho fumanwe ditharollo tse kgonehang le mekgwa e meng e teng ho Puso ya ho sebetsana le ditlolo tsena tsa molao.

src: Izwakalise ukuthokoza kwayo kiwo woke amaSewula Afrika asekela imizamo yokuletha ubungcono emrarweni wesomiso.
tgt: Letona la Mehlodi ya Diminerale Mosebenzi Zwane, Letona Kantorong ya Moporesidente Susan Shabangu le Letona la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba Bathabile Dlamini – ba thontsweng ke Moporesidente Zuma ho fana ka tshehetso ho mebuso ya diporofense, beng ba morafo le malapa a amehang ho latela koduwa ya Morafong wa Gauta wa Lily ho la Barberton – ba tsebisitse Kabinete ka diketsahalo tsa moraorao tjena.

src: IKhabinethi izwakalisa ukuthokoza kwayo kilabo abasilaleleko isibawo sokubika izehlakalo zokuvuza kwamanzi, ngokusekela iJima lokuLwa nokuVuza kwaManzi, elidoswa phambili nguNgqongqotjhe wezaManzi uNomvula Mokonyane.
tgt: Kabinete e imatahantse le Moporesidente kgoeletsong ya setjhaba ya ho dula se behile basebeletsi ba bararo ba morafo ba ntseng ba tshwasehile mokoting le ba malapa a bona menahanong le dithapelong.

src: Kevin Govender we-Ofisi leKapa lezokuThuthukisa ngezomKayi neHlangano yamaZwe ngamaZwe kezomKayi (i-International Astronomical Union), ozakuthokozwa ngonongorwana ohlanganyelweko weMendlela ka-Edinburgh erhanyazelako emnyakeni wee-2016 ngokuvula kwakhe i-Ofisi lezokuThuthukisa ngezomKayi eKapa.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa Monghadi Kevin Govender ho tswa Kantorong ya Thuto ya Dinaledi bakeng sa Ntshetsopele le Kopano ya Matjhaba ya Thuto ya Dinaledi e Motse Kapa ya tla abelwa ka kopanelo kgau ya maemo a hodimo ya Medale wa Edinburgh wa 2016 bakeng sa ho theha Kantoro ya Thuto ya Dinaledi bakeng sa Ntshetsopele ho la Motse Kapa.

src: U-Govender umSewula Afrika wokuthoma ukuthola lonongorwana wezinga eliphezulu epumelelweni yesayensi netheknoloji, elekelela ukukhuphula ilwazi ngomuntu nangehlalakuhle yakhe umuntu.
tgt: Govender ke moAforika Borwa wa pele wa ho amohela kgau ena ya maemo a hodimo bakeng sa diphihlello tsa saense le thekenoloji tse nyehelang kutlwisisong le ho pheleng hantle ha batho.

src: IKhabinethi ibuka beyithokozisa umdansi we-ballet u-Leroy Mokgatle oneminyaka yobudala eli-16, othumbe unongorwana i-Audience Favourite, wathumba nomfundalize ephaliswaneni lamazwe ngamazwe le-ballet, i-Prix de Lausanne International Ballet e-Switzerland.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa setantshi se dilemo di 16 sa ballet Leroy Mokgatle ya hapileng kgau ya Audience Favourite le moputso wa ho ithuta ho Tlhodisano ya Matjhaba ya Ballet ya Prix de Lausanne ho la Switzerland.

src: U-Mokgatle umSewula Afrika wokuthoma ukuthumba lonongorwana eminyakeni ema-28, kanti-ke ungowesibili emlandweni welizwe leSewula Afrika.
tgt: Ke moAforika Borwa wa pele wa ho hapa moputso wa ho ithuta dilemong tse 28 mme ke wa bobedi nalaneng ya naha ena.

src: IKhabinethi ihlanganyela noMengameli uZuma ekuthokoziseni abathumbi baboNongorwana bobuNtu bomNyaka wesiBili.
tgt: Kabinete e imatahanya le Moporesidente Zuma bakeng sa ho thoholetsa bahlodi ba Dikgau tsa Bobedi tsa Selemo ka seng tsa Ubuntu.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozisa umbethi wefleji u-Wouter Kellerman, nesiqhema sesicathamiya i-Ladysmith Black Mambazo, kunye nomvumi weengoma zekolo u-Neville D ngokuphakanyiswa kwamagama wabo ukuthi babe hlangana nalabo abangaqalelelwa ukuthumba unongorwana wezokuvuma we-Grammy.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa seletsi sa fulute Wouter Kellerman, sehlopha sa mmino wa setso sa Ladysmith Black Mambazo le sebini sa mmino wa bodumedi Neville D bakeng sa ho kgethwa bakeng sa dikgau tsa 2016 tsa Grammy.

src: Lababavumi babakhuthazi, begodu baliphaphisela phezulu iflarha leSewula Afrika.
tgt: Dikgalala tsena ke kgothatso mme di fofisetsa folakga ya Aforika Borwa hodimo.

src: IinQunto zeKhabinethi eziQakathekileko IKhabinethi iphasise ukumenyezelwa komTlamo wokuCitha ukuSilaphalazeka koMmoya eeNdaweni eziMinyeneko zabaNtu abaRhola iMali eNcani eSewula Afrika, kobanyana umphakathi uzokuphefumula ngawo.
tgt: Kabinete e tjhaelletse monwana phatlalatso ya Lewa la Moralo bakeng sa Tshilafatso ya Moya Metseng e Teteaneng ya Badudi ba Lekeno le tlase ba Aforika Borwa bakeng sa hore setjhaba se tshwaele.

src: INyanga yamaLungelo wobuNtu ngoNtaka wee-2016 izakugidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “ISewula Afrika iBumbene ekuLwiseni Ibandlululo.” UmNyango wezobuKgwari namaSiko uvule ihlelo elizakuthatha inyanga, ngalo ekuzakukhulunyisanwa ngokusebenzisana ekwakhiweni komphakathi ongabandlululi ngombala nangobulili, olinganako nophilisana ngokwentando yenengi.
tgt: Kgwedi ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ka Hlakubele 2016 e tla ketekwa tlasa mookotaba: “Aforika Borwa e kopane kgahlanong le semorabe.” Lefapha la Bonono le Botjhaba le se le hlophisitse lenaneo la kgwedi kaofela le kenyeletsang lethathama la dipuisano tse mabapi le ho sebetsa mmoho ho aha setjhaba sa demokerasi se hlokang kgethollo ka morabe, ka bong le se lekalekanang.

src: IKulumiswana yokuLwa neenDakamizwa Hlangana kwe-Russia ne-Afrika ezokubanjelwa e-ICC ye-Durban ukusukela mhlana abu-8 ukuyokufika nakali-9 kuNtaka wee-2016 ivula ikundla yokuphakamisa iHlelo eliPheleleko lokuLwa neenDakamizwa eliZweni lOke (2013-2017).Ipi yokulwa neendakamizwa ikhambisana nomTlamo wokuThuthukisa weliZweloke, kanti-ke ikulumiswano le ingaphasi kwe-AU, yona elandelela iimbopho zeemVumelwano ezifaneleko eziPhathelene neenDakamizwa nobuLelesi obuHleliweko hlangana namaZwe aHlukahlukileko ngaphasi kweHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko, neHlelo lamaGadango le-AU lokuLawulwa kweenDakamizwa (2013-2017) neemvumelwana ze-BRICS ( i-Brazil, i-Russia, i-Indiya, i-China, neSewula Afrika).
tgt: Puisano ya Russia-Africa e Kgahlanong le Dithethefatsi Durban ho tloha ka la 8 ho isa ka la 9 Hlakubele 2016 e fana ka lepatlelo ho matlafatsa Moralo o ka Sehloohong wa Naha wa Dithethefatsi (2013-2017).Ntwa kgahlanong le dithethefatsi tse seng molaong e tsamaelana le Morero wa Ntshetsopele ya Naha (NDP) mme dipuisano di tlasa tataiso ya AU ho tsitlallela boitlamo ho ya kaDitumellano tsa UN tsa Botlokotsebe bo Hlophisitsweng ba Dithethefatsi ho Phatlalla le Dinaha, Moralo wa AU wa Tshebetso hodima Taolo ya Dithethefatsi (2013-2017) le ditumellano tsa BRICS (Brazil, Russia, India, China le Aforika Borwa).Khonferense ena e latelang ho dula ha Puisano ya Russia-Africa e Kgahlanong le Dithethefatsi, eo morero wa yona e leng ho fana ka boemo bo matlafaditsweng ba kamoo baetapele ba lefatshe ba ikemiseditseng ho sebetsana le bothata ba matjhaba ba dithethefatsi.

src: Ukukhethelwa komZenda u-Carim kilesisikhundla, ngahlanye kuyindlela yokutjengisa umsebenzi oqakathekileko owenziwa yiSewula Afrika ku-WTO, ukube kanti ngahlanye kubufakazi bobunjalo bakhe umZenda u-Carim.
tgt: Thonyo ya Moambasatara Carim ke karolo ya kananelo ya karolo ya bohlokwa eo Aforika Borwa e e bapalang ka hara WTO mme ka ho le leng ke bopaki ba bokgoni ba mosebetsi o kgabane wa Moambasatara Carim.

src: IKhabinethi isitjhejile isimemezelo se-Barclays PLC somnqopho wayo wokuphungula amatjhere wayo ama-62,3% ku-Barclays Africa Group Limited (i-BAGL) ngesikhathi esiminyaka emibili ukuya eminyakeni emithathu ezako.
tgt: Kabinete e lemohile tsebiso ya PLC ya Barclays mabapi le maikemisetso a yona a ho fokotsa 62.3% tsa diabo ho Barclay Africa Group Limited (BAGL) nakong ya dilemo tse pedi ho isa ho tse tharo tse tlang.

src: I-Barclays PLC, khulu khulu umPhathi oyiHloko yayo, sikhe sakhulumisana neZiko lezeeMali kunye neBulungelomali eliKhulu leSewula Afrika bakhulumisana tjhatjhalazi, begodu siyasithokozela isibopho sekhamphani le sokuphumelelisa iqhinga layo elitjha ngendlela ezakuphungula igalelo leminotho i-BAGL esebenza kiyo.
tgt: Barclays PLC, haholoholo Mohlanka e Moholo wa Phethahatso (CEO), e buisane ka bobedi le Lefapha la Naha la Matlotlo le Banka ya Risefe ya Aforika Borwa kopanong e bulehileng, mme re ananela boitlamo ba khamphani ba ho kenya tshebetsong lewa la yona le letjha ka tsela eo le tla fokotsa kgahlamelo ho meruo eo BAGL e sebetsang ka hara yona.

src: IBulungelomali eliKhulu lizakusebenzisana ne-Barclays PLC ne-BAGL ngomnqopho wokuqinisekisa ukuthi iyathundubazwa ingozi engaba khona kilelitjhuguluko elenziwako, begodu namagadango afaneleko azakuthathwa khona kuzakulawulwa iimali ezizabe zisebenza kilamatjhuguluko aphakanyiswako.
tgt: Banka ya Risefe ya Aforika Borwa e tla sebetsa le Barclays PLC le BAGL ho netefatsa hore dikotsi dife kapa dife tse ka nnang tsa hlaha ho tswa ho tumellano ena di a fokotswa mme mekgwa e nepahetseng e tla nkuwa bakeng sa ho laola phallo ya ditjhelete le thepa tse tla bakwa ke tumellano ena.

src: Abotitjhere laba abancamileko bathuthusela ilizwe lekhethu phambili ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi amatlasi wabo aveza abafundi abakhuthazekileko, abazakuba nendima yesandla sokuthuthukisa iSewula Afrika.
tgt: Matitjhere ana a itetseng a ntshetsa naha ya rona pele ka ho netefatsa hore diphaposi tsa ona tsa borutelo di hlahisa baithuti ba kgothetseng ba tla nyehela ntshetsopeleng ya Aforika Borwa.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozisa i-Market Theatre yeJwanisbhege ngokugidinga kwayo ama-40 weminyaka yasungulwa.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa Market Theatre ka hara Johannesburg bakeng sa ho keteka selemo sa yona sa bo- 40th e le teng.

src: Phela ithiyetha le yaba litshwayo lomZabalazo, ngokucoca indaba yeSewula Afrika eliqiniso.
tgt: Nakong ya mmuso wa kgethollo theathara ena e ile ya ba letshwao la Boitseko ka ho bolela pale ya nnete ya Aforika Borwa.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozisa utitjhere womvumo uNomzana Chad Hendricks, we-Retreat ese-Cape Flats, ngokuthumba kwakhe iphaliswano labavumisi eliburhanyarhanya, i-Len van Zyl Conductors’ Competition, eKapa.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa titjhere ya mmino, Monghadi Chad Hendricks, ho tswa Retreat ho la Cape Flats bakeng sa ho hapa Phehisano ya Maemo ya Batsamaisi ba Dikhwaere ya Len van Zyl Motse Kapa.

src: UNongorwanakhe amthumbileko ngozamusa e-Amerikha ayokufunda simahla ukuya phambili e-Philadelphia Orchetra, lapho azakufundiswa khona nguPhrofesa odumileko u-Victor Yampolsky, e-Chicago.
tgt: Moputso wa hae o kenyeletsa ho ya ithuta bakeng sa dikgwedi tse tharo ho la Amerika mme nakong eo Monghadi Hendricks o tla ithuta ho Philadelphia Orchestra mme o tla rupellwa ke Moporofesara ya tsebahalang Victor Yampolsky ho la Chicago.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozisa umvezi wamafilimu uNomzana Anant Singh, ngokuphuma kwakhe isithathu ngefilimu i-Shepherds and Butchers kuNongorwana i-Panorama Audience Award for Fiction Film, e-Berlin International Film Festival.
tgt: Kabinete e thoholetsa mohlahisi wa difilimi, Monghadi Anant Singh, bakeng sa ho putswa ka maemo a boraro bakeng sa filimi ya Shepherds and Butchers Ho Dikgau tsa Babohi tsa Panorama bakeng sa Fiction Film ho Mokete wa Matjhaba wa Difilimi wa Berlin.

src: Le-ke yipumelelo ekulu, njengoba phela ifilimu leli beliphalisana namanye amafilimu ama-51 avela emazweni ama-.
tgt: Sena ke phihlello e kgolo kaha filimi eo e ne e phehisana le difilimi tse ding tse 51 ho tswa dinaheng tse DithonyoDithonyo kaofela di tla lokelwa ke ho netefatswa ha mangolo a thuto le tumellano e amehang.

src: UDorh Mantlhake J Maboya uqatjhwe esikhundleni sokuba liSekela likamNqophisi Zombelele (i-DGG): UmThethokambiso WezeKharikhyulamu NezokuTjheja emNyangweni wezeFundo esiSekelo.
tgt: Thonyo ya Ngaka Mantlhake J Maboya jwaloka Motlatsi wa Molaodikakaretso (DDG): Leano la Kharikholamo le Bodisa ho Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo.

src: U-Mma u-Shamilla Chettiar uqatjhwe esikhundleni sokuba yi-DDG: ImiSebenzi yezomThethokambiso nezeLwazi emNyangweni wezokuVakatjha.
tgt: Thonyo ya Mofumahadi Shamilla Chettiar jwaloka DDG: Ditshebeletso tsa Leano le Tsebo ho Lefapha la Bohahlaudi.

src: Imibiko le godu iqalisisa nokuphumelelisa iNembombono yomNyaka wee-2030, njengoba kuvezwa mTlamo wokuThuthukiswa kweliZweloke (i-NDP), wona onqophe ukurarha ubuchaka, nokutlhogeka kwemisebenzi kunye nokutjhiyana ngendima kwesitjhaba.
tgt: Hape di re atametsa ho fihlelleng Tjhebelopele ya 2030, jwaloka ha e lohothwa ho Morero wa Ntshetsopele ya Naha (NDP), o morero wa lona e leng ho mekamekana le bofuma, tlhokeho ya mesebetsi le ho se lekalekane.

src: Balinganiselwa eengidini ezintathu abantu abavakatjhele iinteyitjhi zokuvowudela elizweni lokeli, kanti-ke ebantwini abazii-544 552 ebebathoma ukuzitlolisela ukuvowuda (abama-78%) bebangaphasi kweminyaka ema-30 lokhu-ke kusitjengiso sokuthi amaSewula Afrika azimisele ukufaka isandla ekwakhiweni kwehlelo lentando yenengi.
tgt: Batho ba ka etsang dimilione tse tharo ba etetse diteishene tsa ho vouta naheng ka bophara mme tsa dingodiso tse ntjha tse 544 552 (78.6%) e ne e le tsa batho ba ka tlasa dilemo tse 30, e leng se bontshang boikemisetso ba maAforika Borwa ba ho nka karolo ho aheng demokerasi ya rona.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozela ukuvulelwa kweenkhamphani zeSewula Afrika amathuba emnothweni we-Nigeria emakorweni ngamakoro, njengekoro yezobunjiniyera, zemithangalasisekelothintano, zokwakha, zommoya, zeembikiindaba, zamahotela, zamabhanga, zokuzithabisa, zokwakha, zeentolo kunye nezokuthungathwa kwe-oli nerhasi.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela ho buleha ha moruo wa Nigeria bakeng sa dikhamphani tsa Aforika Borwa makaleng a fapafapaneng a jwaloka a boenjinere, dikgokahanyo tsa mehala, kaho, bofofisi, boraditaba, boeti, dibanka, boithabiso, thepa, mabenkele, le ditshebeletso tsa ho tsonngwa ha oli le kgase.

src: Nje iKhabinethi ilindele ukwanda kwamasiso we-Nigeria lapha eSewula Afrika azakuqinisa ukurhwebelana hlangana kwamazwe amabili la.
tgt: Kabinete e shebile ka tebello ho eketseha ha palo ya matsete a Nigeria ka hara Aforika Borwa a tla kgothaletsa kgwebisano ya metjha e mmedi pakeng tsa dinaha tsena tse pedi.

src: Umphumela wemikhulumiswana nokusebenzisana hlangana kwalamazwe amabili angamakhulu kezomnotho e-Afrika uzakuhlanganisa iminotho yawo neyamanye amazwe we-Afrika, ngaleyindlela kwande amathuba wokusebenzisana kweemakethe kuphakame namathuba wokuhluma komnotho nokuvuleka kwemisebenzi e-Afrika.
tgt: Diphetho tsa dipuisano pakeng tsa meruo e mmedi e meholo ka ho fetisisa ka hara kontinente di tla kopanya meruo ya lebatowa, kahoo e tla be e eketsa mmaraka o tshwanang le ho phahamisa boikitlaetso bo teng bakeng sa kgolo ya moruo le kgiro ka hara Aforika.

src: Kuqakathekile ukuyelela ukuthi solo iSewula Afrika yathoma ukuphilisana ngentando yenengi, ikghone ukungena eKhonfrensini yesine yePhasi lOke yaboMma ngomNyaka we-1995, yatlikitla nesiVumelwano se-Beijing neyeKundla yokuThatha amaGadango wona umnyaka loyo.
tgt: Tulo ena e etsahala ka selemo sa bohlokwa bakeng sa Aforika Borwa kaha e tshwaya mekolokotwane e meraro ya bohlokwa, e leng Sehopotso sa bo-20 sa Molaotheo wa Riphaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ya 1996, Sehopotso sa bo-40 sa Merusu ya Batjha ba Soweto le Sehopotso sa bo-60th sa mohwanto wa basadi wa 1956.Aforika Borwa e hlahisitse tlaleho ho UN CSW60 mme sena se re neha monyetla wa ho metha kgatelopele eo re e entseng esale ho tloha ka ho thwasa ha demokerasi.

src: Ngokukhambisana nesivumelwano i-E/RES/2013/18 somKhandlu wezomNotho nezokuHlalisana komPhakathi ngaPhasi kwe-UN, iSewula Afrika izibophelele ekurageleni phambili ngokuphumelelisa isiVumelewano se-Beijing neKundla yokuThatha amaGadango, esimtlamo wokuthoma ukuhlomisa nokuthuthukisa abomma.
tgt: Ho bohlokwa ho lemoha hore esale ho tloha ka tsamaiso ya demokerasi ya Aforika Borwa, hara tse ding, e nkile karolo ho Khonferense ya Lefatshe ya Basadi ya bo-40 ka 1995, le ho saena Tumellano ya Beijing le Lepatlelo la Tshebetso selemong sona seo.

src: Kwenziwa amatjhuguluko emThethweni weenJamiso zaboMasipaladi we-1998 ( umThetho 117 we-1998 ) ngaphasi kwaboRhulumende beeNdawo, wona owabethwa ngaphambi kwekhetho lokuthoma lentando yenengi, elabanjwa ngomhlaka wesi-5 womnyaka wee-2000.
tgt: Dihlomathiso di a etswa ho Mebuso ya Lehae: Molao wa Dibopeho tsa Bomasepala, wa 1998 (Molao 117 wa 1998), o kentsweng tshebetsong pele ho dikgetho tsa pele tsa mebuso ya lehae tsa demokerasi tse etsahetseng ka la 5 Tshitwe 2000.Dihlomathiso di tla ntlafatsa tsamaiso ya dikgetho tsa mebuso ya lehae mme hara diphethoho tse ding, di rerile ho:a) hlomathisa maemo a bomasepala ba Mokgahlelo Ab) tlosa ditshupiso ho dibaka tsa bolaodi ba diterekec) hlakisa letsatsi la ho qala mosebetsing ha mokhanselarad) ho tiisetsa hore Moporesidente o tshwanela ho beha le ho phatlalatsa letsatsi la dikgetho tsa bomasepalae) dumella bakeng sa katoloso ho phatlalatso ya sephetho sa dikgethof) hloka hore motsamaisi wa masepala a tsebise IEC ka dikgeo tsa mosebetsi watengg) tiisetsa hore Setho sa Lekgotla la Phethahatso se phatlalatsa le ho beha letsatsi la dikgetho tsa tlatsetsoh) hlakisa ditlhoko tsa khoramo bakeng sa kopano ya lekgotlai) hlakisa maemo a ho vouta a mokhanselara ya tshwereng marapo nakong ya kopano ya lekgotlaj) eketsa phapang ya palo ya bakgethi wateng ka nngwe nakong ya kopano ya lekgotla lek) eketsa phapang ya palo ya bakgethi wateng ka nngwe nakong ya tsheho ya meedi ho hlakisa kabo ya ditulo tse ngata ho feta tekano ka hara bomasepala.

src: UMengameli uZuma uzokudosa phambili imigidingo yeLanga lamaLungelo wobuNtu eTatawini lemiDlalo i-Moses Mabhida eKwaZulu-Natal ngoMvulo wamhlana ama-21 kuNtaka wee-2016, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “ ISewula Afrika ibumbene iyinyanda ekulweni nebandlululo.” Njengoba kwamenyezelwa eKulumeni yoBunjalo beliZwe yomNyaka wee-2016, iLanga lamaLungelo wobuNtu lanoNyaka lizakwendlala isendlalelo sehlelo lesikhathi eside sokwakha umphakathi onganabandlululo.
tgt: Moporesidente Zuma o tla etella pele mekete ya Letsatsi la Ditokelo tsa Botho Lebaleng la Dipapadi la Moses Mabhida KwaZulu-Natal ka Mantaha, 21 Hlakubele 2016 tlasa mookotaba: “Aforika Borwa e kopane kgahlanong le bomorabe.” Jwaloka ha ho phatlaladitswe ho Puo ka Maemo a Setjhaba ya 2016, Letsatsi la Ditokelo tsa Botho la selemong sena le tla beha motheo wa lenaneo la nako e telele la ho aha setjhaba se hlokang bomorabe.

src: IKhabinethi ibawa woke amaSewula Afrika ukuthi abumbane acithe ibandlulo – kungaba libandlulo elenzeka emakhaya, emphakathini, emibuthanweni yomphakathi, emsebenzini namkha eenkundleni zokucocisana nge-inthanethi komphakathi.
tgt: Kabinete e ipiletsa ho maAforika Borwa oohle ho kopana kgahlanong le ho tshweleng ka mathe ha bomorabe – e ka ba ka malapeng a rona, hara metse, dikopanong tsa kahisano, mesebetsing kapa ho marangrang a dikgokahanyo tsa kahisano.

src: Amalunga wesiGungu azakukhulumisana acocisane namaSewula Afrika elizweni lokeli ngeVeke yeMbizo ukusukela mhlana ama-4 ukuya nakali-10 kuSihlabantangana wee-2016, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: "Sisoke siRagela iSewula Afrika Phambili: Thuthuka Sewula Afrika.” Iveke le ithomana neVeke YesiFunda seKhetho sePalamende kunye nesikhumbuzo seNyanga yeKululeko.
tgt: Ditho tsa Phethahatso di tla ikopanya le maAforika Borwa ho parola le naha nakong ya Beke ya Imbizo ya Naha ya ho tsepamisa Maikutlo pakeng tsa la 4 le 10 Mmesa 2016, tlasa mookotaba: “Mmoho re ntshetsa Aforika Borwa pele: Hola Aforika Borwa.” Beke ena e kopana le Beke ya Kopano ya Palamente le Setjhaba le sehopotso sa Kgwedi ya Tokoloho.

src: UmNyango wezaManzi nezokuHlwengisa usaphethene nomsebenzi wokuqeda ihlelo lokuthuthwa kweensila zezindlwana zokuphumela ngamathungana, kanti bekube nje sewuqede ama-78% wokusetjenziswa kwalelihlelo eendaweni ezihlelekileko eSewula Afrikapha.
tgt: Lefapha la Metsi le tsamaiso ya Dikgwerekgwere le ntse le le motjheng wa ho fedisa mokgwa wa mabakete mme ho fihlela mona le se le fedisitse 78.8% ya mokgwa wa mabakete dibakeng tsa mekhukhu ka hara Aforika Borwa.

src: ITjingalanga Kapa seyiliqede ngama-99.8% lelihlelo.
tgt: Kapa Bophirima e fihlelletse phediso ya 99.8%.

src: Enanini ebeliqothelwe elizii-26 120 e-Tlhagwini Kapa, nePumalanga Kapa, neTlhagwini Tjingalanga kunye neFreyistata, angaba zii-11 650 amahlelo asele aqediwe bekube nje.
tgt: Ho tloha ho maikemisetso a 26 120 bakeng sa Kapa Leboya, Kapa Botjhabela, Leboya Bophirima le Foreisetata, mekgwa e ka bang 11 650 e se e phethetswe ho fihlela kajeno.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozela indima eyenziwa liHlelo lemiNyaka emiHlanu lokuLwa nokuVuza kwaManzi, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi : “ Elinye Nelinye Ithosi Liqakathekile.” Ihlelweli linqophe ukuthola , lifundise belithume abantu abatjha abazii-15 000 bayokwenza umsebenzi ophathelene nalokhu kufuneka abantu abatjha abaneGeryidi 12 namkha i-N3 ubuncani bakhona, abamaplambara, nama-athizeni kunye nabenza imisebenzi yezamanzi.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela kgatelopele e seng e entswe ke lenaneo la Ntwa ya ho dutla tlasa mookotaba: “Lerothodi ka leng ke la bohlokwa.” Lenanaeo le rerile ho thaotha, ho rupella le ho jala batho ba batjha ba 15 000 ba nang le bonyane Kereiti 12 kapa N3 jwaloka boradipeipi, ditsebi le baemedi ba metsi.

src: IKhabinethi ithokozisa abatloli abalekelelanako, uMandla Dube no-Leon Otto bePhambili Media ngefilimu i-Kalushi: The Story of Solomon Mahlangu.
tgt: Kabinete hape e thoholetsa bangodimmoho Mandla Dube le Leon Otto ba Pambili Media bakeng sa filimi Kalushi: The Story of Solomon Mahlangu.

src: UMengameli uZuma uhlome isiketjana sokuthoma eBhayi, ezithiywe ngeMvezo, indawo lapho kwabelethelwa khona uMengameli wangaphambilini u-Nelson Mandela.
tgt: Moporesidente Zuma o thakgotse seketswana sa pele se hulang ho la Port Elizabeth, se reheletsweng Mvezo, e leng tulo ya tswalo ya Moporesidente wa mehleng Nelson Mandela.

src: Kumnikelo womthelo wamaSewula Afrika athobela umthetho wePhiko lokuButhelelwa komThelo leSewula Afrika (i-SARS) ukuthi urhulumende ukghona ukunikela iinsetjenziswa ezitlhogwa khulu nokwenza ngcono amaphilo wamaSewula Afrika.
tgt: Sena ke sesupo se hlakileng sa matla a moruo wa rona o hlabolohang le ka tlasa maemo a WEBTOKEN ka dinyehelo tsa lekgetho la maAforika Borwa a lokelang le pokeletso e hlwahlwa e etswang ke Ditshebeletso tsa Lekeno tsa Aforika Borwa hore mmuso o kgone betere ho fana ka ditshebeletso tse hlokahalang haholo tse nyehelang bakeng sa ntlafatso ya bophelo ba maAforika Borwa.

src: IKhabinethi yamukela isimemezelo sikaMengameli uZuma samhlana ama-3 kuRhoboyi 2016 njengelanga lamaKhetho kaRhulumende weKhaya.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela tsebiso ya Moporesidente Zuma ya la 3 Phato 2016 jwaloka letsatsi la Dikgetho tsa Mebuso ya lehae tsa 2016.

src: Urhulumende uthabile ngombana iimpelaveke ezimbili zokuzitlolisela ukuvowuda mhlana ama-5 ukufikela naka-6 kuNtaka namhlana ali-9 ukufikela nakali-10 kuSihlabantakana kwaba nesibalo esikhulu sabavowudi esavakatjhela iintetjhi zokuvowuda, khulukhulu abavowudi behlandla lokuthoma nelutjha.
tgt: Mmuso o itumetse hore mafelo a beke a mabedi a boingodiso a la 5–6 Tlhakubele le la 9–10 Mmesa ho bonahetse ha batho ba ka nnang ba kgetha ba tlile ka bongata diteisheneng tsa ho kgetha,haholo-holo ba tla beng ba vouta lekgetlo la pele le batjha.

src: Abavowudi bangathumela inomboro yabo kamazisi nge-SMS ku-3281.0 nanyana badosele iziko lemitato ku-0800 11 8000 ukuqinisekisa ubujamo babo.
tgt: Bakgethi hape ba ka romela dimoro sa bona tsadi boitsebiso ka SMS ho 3281.0 kapa ba letsetse setsi sa mehala ho 0800 11 8000 ho netefatsa maemo a bona.

src: IKhabinethi yemukele ukuhlonywa ngokomthetho kwe-eChannel Pilot Project yomNyango wezangeKhaya (i-DHA) nguMengameli uZuma.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela ho thakgolwa semmuso ha Porojeke ya Teko ya eChannel ya Lefapha la Merero ya Lehae (DHA) ke Moporesidente Zuma.

src: Ihlelo elitjheli lisiza izakhamuzi ukwenza isibawo sikaMazisi oliKarada kubelula ngokukhandela imijeje emide.
tgt: Tsamaisong ena e ntjha ya ntlafatso e dumella baahi ho etsa dikopo tsa bona tsa dikarete tsa boitsebiso ka inthanete ho phema mela e melelele.

src: UmThethomlingwa lo usula umThetho wokuHlonipha nokuSetjenziswa kweenQunto zangaPhetjheya, we-1977 (uMthetho Nomboro 40 we-1977) begodu ukhibelela uMthetho wagadesi oVikela amaBhizinisi, we-1978 (umThetho Nomboro 99 we-1978).
tgt: Bili e fetola Molao wa Kananelo le Tiisetso ya Phano ya Bonamodi ba Matjhaba, 1977 (Molao 40 wa 1977) mme hape e fetola Molao wa hajwale wa Tshireletso ya Kgwebo, 1978 (Molao 99 wa 1978).

src: Iintjhukumiswezi zisekela iqhinga leSewula Afrika lokuphatha ekurarululeni ikinga yokucwiywa kwabobhejani nokuthengiswa kweempondo zabobhejani bukhobosi.
tgt: Dikgothaletso di tshehetsa lewa le kopanetsweng la Aforka Borwa la katamelo ya bolaodi ba ho rarolla ho tsongwa ho seng molaong ha ditshukudu le kgwebisano e seng molaong ya manaka a ditshukudu.

src: Ikomiti itjhukumisa bonyana isiqunto sanje sokubeka iimpondo zabobhejani zingathengiswa sihlale sinjalo kunokuthengisa ngeempondo.
tgt: Komiti e kgothaletsa hore mokgwa wa hajwale wa ho boloka mohlape o ntseng o le teng wa naha kgahlanong le kgwebisano ka manaka a ditshukudu.

src: Iqhinga lelizwe lifaka hlangana ukuphepha, ukuthuthukisa umphakathi ukutjhewa kwemvelo iinqalelelo zomthetho kunye nokulawulwa kweendingo.
tgt: Lewa la katamelo la naha le kenyeletsa polokeho matlafatso ya badudi taolo ya tswadiso diphano tsa molao o tla kenngwang tshebetsong ka tsela e hlwahlwa le ho hatellwa le taolo ya ho batleha ha manaka a ditshukudu.

src: IKhabinethi yemukela ukugwalwa kwenhlamvu zemali yesikhumbuzo sonyaka wee-2016:a) ILandelano leHlamvu ye-National Geographic –yaboKatsu abaKhulu: I-‘The Cheetah’.b) ILandelano leHlamvu yePonde noTiki weSiliva ‘eyatlanywa ngeSewula Afrika–i-‘Dolosse’.Imigwalo yeenhlamvu lezi kunye neememezelo zayo, zizakugadangiswa kuGazede kaRhulumende begodu zikhiqizwe zithengiswe ngedlela ejayelekileko.
tgt: Kabinete e tjhaelletse monwana meralo ya dikhoine tsa 2016 tsa sehopotso tse latelang:a) Letoto la Naha la Khoine ya Tlhaho– Boikitlaetso ba BigCats : ‘The Cheetah’.b) Letoto la dikhoine tsa Sterling-silver crown le dikhoine tsa tickey ‘Ditshibollo tsa Aforika Borwa–‘Dolosse’.Meralo ya dikhoine,mmoho le diphatlalatso tsa tsona, di tla hatiswa Koranteng ya Mmuso, mme ebe di tla be se di hlahiswa ka metjha e tlwaelehileng.

src: UMengameli uzakudosa phambili imigidingo yeLanga leKululeko yeLizwe Loke nakama-27 kuSihlabantakana 2016 eLimpopo, e-Giyani Stadium ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sisoke sakha imiphakathi engcono -uRhulumende weKhaya uyindaba yawo woke umuntu”.IKhabinethi yenza ibizelo kiwo woke amaSewula Afrika namaziko ukutjengisa ithando lawo lelizwe ngokukhambela iminyanya ehlukeneko yokugidinga iNyanga yeKululeko.
tgt: Moporesidente o tla etella pele mekete ya Naha ya Letsatsi la Tokoloho ka la 27 Mmesa 2016 Limpopo, Lebaleng la dipapadi la Giyani tlasa mookotaba: “Mmoho re aha metse e betere–Mebuso ya le hae ke taba ya mang le mang”.Kabinete e ipiletsa ho maAforika Borwa kaofela le makala a mang ho bontsha lerato la naha ka ho nka karolo diketsahalong tse fapafapaneng tsa ho hopola Kgwedi ya Tokoloho.

src: IKhabinethi yemukela ukukhetha kukaMengameli uZuma u-Advocate Jan Lekhoa Mothibi, njengeHloko yeKoro eKhethekileko yokuPhenya, begodu imfisela ipumelelo esikhundleni sakhe esitjha sokukhandela ikohlakalo nokungaphathi ngefanelo.
tgt: Kabinete e amohela thonyo ke Moporesidente Zuma ya Moatefokate Jan Lekhoa Mothibi, jwaloka Hlooho ya Lekala la Diphuputso tsa Sepolesa le Ikgethang, le ho mo lakaletsa tse molemo boikarabelong ba hae bo botjha ba ho lwantsa bobodu le tsamaiso e mamphemphe.

src: IKhabinethi idlulisa ukutjhiriya kwayo okusuka emrajini wehliziyo emndenini wakwaMakwethu ne-Pan Africanist Congress ngokudlula ephasini kwakaNom.
tgt: Kabinete e fetisetsa matshediso a tswang botebong ba pelo ho lelapa la Makwetu le Pan Africanist Congress ka ho hlokahala ha Monghadi Clarence Makwetu.

src: Lokhu kwakhele kileliKhambo lomBuso likaMengameli u-Jacob Zuma ngoSinyikhaba wee-2011 okwadosela ekuhlonyweni kweKomitjhini yeHlanganyela ye-SA-UAE eyarhabisa umfutho wezerhwebo hlangana namazwe amabili la ukusukela kumabhiliyoni ali-R13 ngomnyaka wee-2011 ukufikela kama-R27 ngomnyaka wee-2015.ISewula Afrika ne-UAE zivumelene ukwandisa itjhebiswano elivezwa mathuba womNotho weLwandle, ukuthuthukisa ukuthunyelwa ngaphandle kwemikhiqizo yezokulima yeSewula Afrika, imikhiqizo eyenziweko khulukhulu iinsetjenziswa zezokuvikela netjhebiswano.
tgt: Sena se ahella hodima Leeto la Puso la Moporesidente Jacob Zuma ka Pudungwana 2011 moo ho bonahetseng ho thehwa ha Khomishene e Kopanetsweng ya SA-UAE e akofisitseng lebelo la kgwebisano e phethahetseng dipakeng tsa dinaha tse pedi tsena ho tloha ho R13 bilione ka 2011 ho ya ho R27 bilione ka 2015.Aforika Borwa le UAE hape di dumellane ho eketsa tshebedisano-mmoho ho sebetsana le menyetla ho Moruo wa Lewatle, ho hodisa ho romellwa dinaheng tse ka ntle ha dihlahiswa tsa temo tsa Aforika Borwa, dihlahiswa tse entsweng difemeng mme ka ho qolleha theko ya tsa tshireletso le bomphato.
